text.description: Roll up, roll up… The Wildest Emporium is open!
text.gameInfo:
Balthazar’s Wild Emporium is a standard 5 reel slot game with 20 winlines (fixed). The game has 3 Freespin bonuses, the top bonus being a 1000 Win Spins with Colossal Wilds. On activation of one of the bonuses, there is a unique gamble feature.

Each press of SPIN will action each reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching 2, 3, 4 or 5 of-a-kind symbols from left to right on any payline.

Set Your Stake
The player can choose their stake by pressing the plus and minus buttons on the right of the screen. The stake will be shown in the stake meter.

Features

  • There are WILD magic orb symbols which substitute for all symbols. The Wild symbols can substitute for the other symbols to help create a line win, except scatters (feature trigger vial symbols).
  • At the top of reels are 3 shelves containing 5 areas to collect vials to unlock the related ‘Free Spin’ bonuses.
  • The Free Spin bonuses are as follows:

Pink Vial Bonus
500 Free Spins with Stacked Wilds. Extra Wild symbols stacked in threes are added to the reels, which spin through the reel apertures to a random stop.

Blue Vial Bonus
750 Free Spins with Expanding Wilds. Any Wild symbols that land in view on reels 1 to 5 will expand to fill the whole reel aperture.

Gold Vial Bonus
1000 Free Spins with Colossal Wilds. Extra Colossal Wild symbols, that can span more than 1 reel, are added to the reels. These spin through the reel apertures to a random stop.

  • During the main game play there will be, at random, Pink, Blue and Gold vial symbols landing in the reel frames. These vials are scatters and trigger anywhere within the reel window on reels 1 and 2.
  • Only 2 of-a-kind matching vial symbols, landing sequentially and paying left to right, will trigger the gamble event.
  • The activated Free Spins feature will enter centre of the screen, showing the player how many vials they have collected and how many there are to go. Reels 3, 4 and 5 keep spinning in anticipation of more vials landing on the reels.
  • The game will present to the player a Free Spin offer to buy the vials off the player by prompting them to 'Collect'. 
  • The player can choose either to take the amount of Free Spins offered and 'Collect' or 'Gamble' some or all of the Free Spins offered to see if further vials of the same colour land on reels 3, 4 and 5.
  • If the player has gambled some or all of the offered Free Spins and no further vial lands on the next reel, then the gamble event is over and any collected Free Spins then play out on the reels.
  • If a further vial lands on the next reel, the gamble event will happen again. This will be the same on each of the reels, so the player is prompted to 'Collect' or 'Gamble' on each of the outcomes for reel 3 and 4 if the same vials land in these reels.
  • The player may part-collect some of their Free Spins at each gamble point. The collected Free Spins will be played out once reel 5 has a resolution.

Buttons

  • Pressing the rotating arrow icon above the Spin button will open a dialogue panel from which the player can access the auto plays adjuster.
  • Pressing the ‘i’ icon, on the right-hand side, will open the Paytable information. The player can tap the arrows left and right to access all the game information. Pressing the ‘X’ button will return the player to the main game interface.
  • Accessing the Paytable will allow the player to toggle the sounds on/off. On a device that is compatible, the player can also turn on/off the vibrate function. On launch of the game, the default setting will be ON for both of these options.

Paytable

  • Only the highest win per bet line is paid.
  • Line wins will pay from leftmost reel to rightmost reel.
  • Adjustment of the stake will dynamically alter the awards in the paytable.

Game Recovery

  • In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc.), depending on the previous state of the game, it will either resume from the point of the last spin or display the outcome of the game already in play.
  • Any winnings will be correctly credited to the player account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.

General Information

  • This game has a theoretical Return to Player (RTP) of between 88.19% and 94.02%.
  • The maximum payout in one spin in this game is £500,000 / €500,000.
  • System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.
  • Due to high production values of this game, lower-tier hardware may run into compatibility issues and, in certain instances, you will not be able to play.

Copyright

  • © Copyright 2016 CORE Gaming Limited – All rights reserved.
  • Unauthorised copying of any images or content by any means is not permitted

text.description: You'll be going bananas to bank a monkey!
text.gameInfo:
Bank A Monkey is a single-stake, £1 instant win scratch card game with a fast winning £500 Jackpot. The theme is a fun game with a Cocktail Monkey Barman and his banana smoothie.

  • Fixed top prize value
  • Your winnings will be credited to your account immediately
  • You will lose your stake amount if you lose the game

Stake

The stake value is set to a single value for this card and cannot be adjusted. The stake value is shown middle-right of the scratch card interface as below:

Instant Win

Stake Value

Bank A Monkey

£1

Start the Game

To start the game, tap the BUY CARD button, located in the centre of the interface.

Once the BUY CARD button has been selected, the game will start. You will be presented with 9 crates, washed up on a beach, and asked to pick 6 of them.

As you pick crates, they will explode open and display either banana skins or whole bananas. The aim of the game is to fill the blender up with a banana smoothie from bananas found within the 9 crates presented.

Once the 6 crates have been chosen, the Monkey will swing from right to left and drop the amount of bananas found in the crates into the blender. The blender will then “blend” and show the outcome of the game.

Buttons

When the default scratch card interface is displayed, (before the game has been started), there is a BUY CARD button and a settings cog, located at the bottom-left. The cog will allow you to set game options.

In game, there is also an AUTO PICK button, located at the bottom-right

Once the game has been bought, the AUTO PICK button becomes active for selection. Pressing the AUTO PICK button will automatically uncover 6 random crates.

How Do You Win?

The aim of the game is to win cash by filling the blender with the banana smoothie, up to the cash levels marked on the outside of the blender.

In the event of a win, (once the card is complete), the total win value from the blender is displayed briefly in a pop-up, centrally on the scratch card interface. The total win value is also displayed in the Total Win field, located top-right of the scratch card interface.

In the event of a loss, (no win on any panel), an ‘UNLUCKY NO WIN’ pop-up is displayed briefly, centrally on the scratch card interface.

To win the player needs to find at least 20 bananas. Table below show the amount of Bananas awarded for each symbol.

Banana Symbol

Amount of Bananas
 

2
 

3
 

4
 

5
 

6
 

7
 

8
 

9
 

10
 

30

After you have picked your boxes, there is a chance a game modifier may be shown. If you have won an amount, the modifier will improve the win. If it was a losing game, the modifier will guarantee a win. These are outlined below:

1. Froth Up

The Monkey will appear next to the blender and press the button, causing a re-blend. This will then show the new win.

2. Banana Rain

The crates will move off the screen and bananas will begin to fall from the sky. The Monkey will swing across to grab more bananas and add them to the blender. This will then be blended again and will show the new win.

3. Air Drop

The crates will drop off the screen and a large crate will be dropped onto the beach and open. The bananas contained within will then be collected by the Monkey and added to the blender and be blended again. The new win will then be shown.

Once the appropriate message has been displayed, the default buttons return to allow the user to play again. Pressing the BUY CARD button will reset the panels for a new game.

Payouts

Instant win product

Panel

Win values

Bank A Monkey

1

£1.00

£2.00

£5.00

£10.00

£50.00

£100.00

£500.00
  • All currencies are expressed in GBP. The amounts stated will apply in the user's own currency.

Game Recovery

  • In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc...), any winnings will be correctly credited to your account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.
  • The sequence and values of events leading to the display of the total award may vary from the animation prior to game recovery. This will not affect the result of the game after the game has recovered.

General Information

  • This game has a theoretical Return to Player (RTP) of 83% and hit rate of 1 in 3.07
  • The maximum payout in one play in this game is £500 / €500.
  • System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.
  • Due to high production values of this game, lower-tier hardware may run into compatibility issues and, in certain instances, you will not be able to play.

Copyright

  • © Copyright 2016 CORE Gaming Limited – All rights reserved.
  • Unauthorised copying of any images or content by any means is not permitted.

text.description: Blast off and climb the bonus ladder to new riches!
text.gameInfo:
Blast Off is a 10 winline, 5x3 reel slot game with a space rocket theme. Game features include special reel spins and a trail with 7 levels of bonuses. The bonus Free Spins bonus and Win Spins bonus have 20 paylines. There is also a multi level Rocket Pots Feature where 500 x your stake can be won!

  • Place your bet by choosing a TOTAL STAKE amount.
  • Hit the SPIN button to get the reels spinning. The spin button changes to a stop button when the reels start spinning. Press the STOP button to stop reel spin immediately.
  • To play game without hitting SPIN every time, hit the AUTOPLAY button and set the conditions for auto play. Then CONFIRM. The spin button changes to a STOP button which you can press to stop auto play.

Blast Off Trail

To activate any bonus on the trail the player has to land 5 or more blue rockets in the base game. The levels are as follows:

  • LEVEL 1: Land 5 blue rockets on the base game to activate 5 Free Spins.
  • LEVEL 2: Land 6 blue rockets on the base game to activate 3 Win Spins.
  • LEVEL 3: Land 7 blue rockets on the base game to activate 3 Win Spins and a higher chance of landing a double height red rocket.
  • BRONZE: Land 8 blue rockets on base game to activate the Bronze level Rocket Pots Feature.
  • SILVER: Land 9 blue rockets on base game to activate the Silver level Rocket Pots Feature.
  • GOLD: Land 10 blue rockets on base game to activate the Gold level Rocket Pots Feature.
  • PLATINUM: Land 11 blue rockets on base game to win 500x your stake.

When the trial is activated, blue rockets will disappear and red rocket will only be active on the 5th reel. If the player reaches level 3 then the red rockets will double in height. During the bonus spins, the player can land one red rocket or more. Each red rocket moves the player up the trail.
Win spins and bonus spins both have 20 win lines
Win Spins are guaranteed win per spin.
The higher up the trail you go, the bigger the win!

MULTI LEVEL ROCKET POTS FEATURE

The bronze, silver and gold levels are the entry levels to the Rocket Pots Feature, featuring a multiplier bonus!
In the bronze level, the player could win between 20x to 50x current stake or could land a rocket to move up to the silver level.
In the silver level, the player could win between 60x to 100x current stake or could land a rocket to move up the gold level.
In the gold level, the player could win between 120x to 200x current stake or could land a rocket to enter the platinum level.
If the player achieves the platinum rocket the x500 win is awarded and the bonus game is over.

Game Rules

  • Only the highest win per line is paid.
  • Line wins will pay from left to right only.
  • Line wins are multiplied by stake per line.

Terms And Conditions

  • The theoretical average return to player is 96.0%.
  • This game is regulated by the Alderney gambling Control Commission.
  • Any combination of wins in a single game is limited and will not exceed £250,000.
  • It may not be possible to reach this limit in a single game from every stake configuration.
  • Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
  • Due to high production values of this game, lower quality hardware may run into performance and compatibility issues. In certain circumstances, you may not be able to play the game.

text.gameInfo:
A Megaways™ slot can produce up to 7 icons per reel each spin. Each cart adds a symbol to reels 2,3,4, and 5, Each spin can have from 2 and 7 icons and each spin can have up to 117649 MEGAWAYS™ to win. 

Select your stake by clicking the left and right arrow buttons on the stake. The stake value is displayed in the stake display. 

All payouts are multiplied by the stake of each individual spin.

Auto play

To set up Auto play press the Auto button. This will display Auto play panel which the player can use to modify the number of spins, set a loss limit or set a win limit. When a loss limit has been set the player can select Start to commence auto play.

When Auto play is on, the Play button will change to a Stop button. The remaining Auto plays will be displayed in the Stop button. The player can cancel Auto play by clicking the Stop button. Auto play will stop automatically if any of the limits set is reached or anything occurs that requires player intervention.

Start the spin

Press the Play button to start the spin at the stake displayed.

The 6 reels will spin and then come to stop, displaying the result.

Carts

Each cart adds a symbol to the reel it is above for reels 2,3,4, and 5.

Reactions

Every winning symbol is part of a reaction and is replaced by symbols coming from above.

Scatter

12 Free Spins are triggered from four gold bars that spell out “GOLD”, any further gold bars have a +5 rather than a letter and provide an additional 5 free games.

Free Spins

During Free Spins there is an unlimited win multiplier which starts at 1 and is increased by 1 after each reaction.

Free Spin Scatter icons can appear in the carts and will award extra free spins.

The stake that was used to trigger the free spins will be used for the free spins duration.

At the end of the free spins, the total winnings for the spins will be displayed. Any winnings will be credited into the players account and regular play then resumes.

Payouts - Standard Icons

Payouts for consecutive icons, regardless of height, from left to right on adjacent symbol positions. All winning combinations are added together. Payouts are in multiples of stake per play. Only the highest win is paid on each winning combination from both ways.

This game has a RTP of 96.00%.

In the event of a non-responsive game or problem during a spin, the game will repeat the incomplete spin and display the result to the player when the game is next launched.

Incomplete games will become void after 90 days and will be forfeited to charity.

System malfunction voids all pays and plays.

text.gameInfo:
Buffalo Rising is a 6-reel slot featuring MEGAWAYS™. Run wild in this great frontier adventure with up to 117,649 ways to win, Cascading symbols and an optional Buffalo Bet allowing you instant access to the Free Spins feature. During Free Spins the Unlimited Win Multiplier is active, which increases after every win. Adjust your Free Spins round for higher multipliers or more spins. Watch out for the Mystery Symbol, all in view will reveal the same random symbol for even more ways to find your fortune!

Step 1: Getting Started

  1. Press the TOTAL BET button to increase or decrease the amount of your TOTAL BET. Select from the list of available stakes from the Total Bet options (depending on Operator configuration and currency equivalent).
  2. Press 'SPIN' to start your game.
  3. There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically. If you wish to cancel this during your auto spins, press the Stop Autoplay button.

Step 2: How To Play

  • Press 'SPIN' to start the game.
  • The reels will spin and eventually stop at random.
  • If the combination of symbols appearing on the reels forms a line of 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6 matching symbols (starting from the left most reel) on any of the MEGAWAYS™, then you win. Any winnings you have will be highlighted causing an explosion and more symbols will cascade in.
  • Winnings will be credited to your account balance.

Cascading Symbols

  • All winning symbols will cause a chain reaction.
  • The winning symbols will be removed from the reels and replaced by new symbols coming from above the reels.
  • There are symbol positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5. They help form wins and are the only positions that can reveal Wild Symbols. These will be replaced from the right.
  • Cascades will continue until no more winning symbols are generated.

MEGAWAYS™

  • Each reel can reveal up to 7 symbols in view.
  • Each spin can have up to 117,649 ways to win.
  • A win is matching consecutive symbols, regardless of height, from left to right starting from the left most reel.
  • All winning combinations are added together.
  • Payouts are multiplied by stake.
  • MEGAWAYS™ under licence from Big Time Gaming.

Wild Symbol

  • The Wild Symbol can only appear in the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5.
  • The Wild Symbol can be used to help form wins by substituting for other symbol excluding scatter symbols.
  • Only the highest win is paid per winning combination.

Mystery Symbol

  • The Mystery Symbol can appear in any position.
  • All Mystery Symbols in view will reveal the same random symbol.
  • The Mystery Symbol cannot reveal scatter symbols.

Scatter

  • The Scatter Symbol can appear in any of the reels but not in the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5.
  • Scatter wins are awarded in addition to reel wins.
  • 4 Scatter Symbols in view awards Free Spins.
  • Triggering Free Spins with more than 4 Scatter Symbols will award additional Free Spins (Dependant on Free Spins Selection).

Buffalo Bet (depending on Operator configuration)

  • The Buffalo Bet can be activated during the Base Game
  • Once activated the reels will spin and guarantee a minimum of 4 Scatter Symbols on the reels, activating Free Spins
  • Buffalo Bet is played at 100x Total Bet

Free Spins Selection

  • At the start of Free Spins the player is given the choice of 4 options:
    • 15 Free Spins and the Unlimited Win Multiplier starts at x1. Triggering Free Spins with additional Scatter Symbols awards 4 extra Free Spins (per additional Scatter Symbol).
    • 10 Free Spins and the Unlimited Win Multiplier starts at x5. Triggering Free Spins with additional Scatter Symbols awards 2 extra Free Spins (per additional Scatter Symbol).
    • 5 Free Spins and the Unlimited Win Multiplier starts at x10. Triggering Free Spins with additional Scatter Symbols awards 1 extra Free Spin (per additional Scatter Symbol).
    • Mystery Choice: The available Free Spins and Multipliers will be shuffled into 6 panels. The player selects one panel from each category. The values shown in the selected panels will be used to initiate the Free Spins Round.

Free Spins

  • During Free Spins the Unlimited Win Multiplier will increase by 1 after every cascade.
  • During Free Spins the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 can reveal Free Spins Scatters and will award extra Free Spins:
    • 3 Free Spins Scatters = 5 extra Free Spins.
    • 4 Free Spins Scatters = 10 extra Free Spins.
  • The Total Bet that was used to trigger the Free Spins will be used for the Free Spins duration.
  • At the end of Free Spins, the total winnings for the spins will be displayed. Any winnings will be credited to the players account and regular play then resumes.

Auto Play

  • There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically.
  • By selecting 'AUTOPLAY' you can choose to place up to 100 bets automatically, one after the other.
  • Select your stake as normal then press the 'AUTOPLAY' button to select the number of 'Autoplay' bets you want to play.
  • Select your Loss Limit (maximum amount willing to lose for the autoplay session) and then press PLAY to begin your autoplays (other options are available).
  • Auto Play will turn off if you get into any bonus round including Free Spins, if you reach the set Loss Limit or if a Progressive pot is awarded (where applicable).
  • You can stop Auto Play from continuing onto the next spin by clicking the 'STOP' button.

Payout Information and Game Rules

  • The maximum win from a single game is £250,000 or 10,000xBet - whichever is reached first (or currency equivalent. Other Operator limits may apply).
  • MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PLAYS AND PAYS.
  • RTP = 96.50%

Applicable date from: 18/10/2018

v1.0

text.gameInfo:
Cobra Cash is a 6 reel slot with 4 symbols high in view with 40 winlines. The game has 4 ‘Wild’ snake Free Spin bonus rounds . The slot also features 7 snaking Wild base game modifiers

Set your stake: At the left of the screen, the player can choose their stake by pressing the + and - buttons. The stake will be shown in the Total Stake meter.

Each press of PLAY will action each reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching 3, 4, 5 or 6 of-a-kind symbols on winlines.

Line wins pay left to right. All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning from the leftmost reel.

All wins shown on different winlines will be shown and paid to the player.

Wild symbols: The Wild symbol can substitute for ALL other symbols EXCEPT the scatter symbols. Using Wild symbols to complete a line does not incur any extra multiplier, unless stated as a multiplier, other than the win for the symbol(s) they substitute. Only the highest paying win on each line will be counted.

Bonus Scatter Symbols: These symbols can appear on any reel. Three or more bonus symbols in view will trigger the bonus Free Spins feature.

  • 3 Bonus symbols award - 7 Free Spins.
  • 4 Bonus symbols award - 7 Free Spins + 5x Stake.
  • 5 Bonus symbols award - 7 Free Spins + 20x Stake.
  • 6 Bonus symbols award - 7 Free Spins + 50x Stake.

Game Features

Snakes

The 7 snakes that will be involved at various times within the modifiers and the Free Spins features are:
  • Grass: Snake with 4 ‘Wild’ segments chained together.
  • Mamba: Snake with 5 ‘Wild’ segments chained together.
  • Rattle: Snake with 6 ‘Wild’ segments chained together.
  • Viper: Snake with 7 ‘Wild’ segments chained together.
  • Boa: Snake with 8 ‘Wild’ segments chained together.
  • Python: Snake with 9 ‘Wild’ segments chained together.
  • Anaconda: Snake with 10 ‘Wild’ double high segments chained together.

Base Game Modifiers

During the base game, on EVERY spin at random, the base reels may spin longer than usual and one of the following modifiers below may execute. The player will be presented with 5 ‘pick me’ options to decide which modifier snake they have.

Once one of the options has been picked there will be a reveal and the snake modifier won will come onto the reels moving around the reel positions.

As the snake moves swiftly around the reels it will cover all of the 6x4 reel positions, as its crosses a number of reel positions it may turn that position ‘Wild’. The snake segments are chained together but can cover any of the 6x4 reel positions. The snake will then leave the reels back to its basket leaving a pattern of Wilds.

These modifiers don’t guarantee a win, but any wins will be paid to the player.

Free Spins

During Free Spins, there can be bonus trigger symbols which will re-trigger the Free Spins feature. The amount of extra Free Spins will depend on the amount bonus trigger symbols in view on that spin (see values below).

  • 2 scatters = 3 extra Free Spins
  • 3 scatters = 5 extra Free Spins
  • 4 scatters = 7 extra Free Spins
  • 5 scatters = 10 extra Free Spins
  • 6 scatters = 15 extra Free Spins

Snake Ladder: The player is presented with the Grass Snake that will swiftly move around the reels during the first spin. Certain segments of the snake that cross the symbol positions making 4 positions ‘Wild’. The Grass Snake will then leave the reels as they halt and any wins will be processed. On the next Free Spin the Grass Snake will be replaced by the Mamba, this time dropping 5 Wilds, again any wins will be processed. On the next spin the Mamba that has left will be replaced by the Rattle (6 Wilds). This will continue upgrading the snake for all 7 Free Spins, ending with the final spin with the Anaconda snake of 10 Wild positions.

Snake Adder: The first snake Grass arrives on the first Free Spin dropping 4 Wilds, this then swiftly slithers off before the reels stop. If there has been NO win, then the second snake Mamba arrives on the reels dropping 5 Wilds, again if there are NO wins on the next spin the Mamba will slither off and be replaced by the Rattle. This will continue upgrading the snake as long as the player has received NO wins.

  • If the player has wins on a particular Free Spin the snake they currently have will come back on and move around the reels to form another ‘Wild’ pattern. This current snake will keep arriving on the reels slithering to other position patterns as long as the player is getting wins. As soon as the player gets NO win the current snake will be upgraded to the next snake for the next Free Spin.
  • This process continues until all 7 Free Spins have been exhausted.

Snake Eyes: Random chance of any snake slithering on to the reels. The player will have 7 Free Spins during which, at random, one of the 7 snakes will slither onto the reels whilst the reels are spinning. The same game mechanic will apply and any symbol positions covered by a snake will turn those positions ‘Wild’. Before the next spin the snake will slither off leaving a ‘Wild’ pattern.

Snake Bite: Random Wilds distributed in pairs co-joined in parallel. The Cobra snake will randomly bite symbols in pairs and turn them into Wilds. With each bite there will be 2 horizontal Wilds added to the reels. On each spin the Cobra snake will bite between 1 to 3 times, therefore turning (2-6 symbols) Wild on each spin. This process continues until all 7 Free Spins have been exhausted. All Free Spins wins will be relative to current total bet and the base game paytable.

Buttons

Pressing the rotating arrow icon, next to the PLAY button, will open the Autoplay functionality.

Pressing the ‘settings’ button, on the right-hand side of the base game screen, will open the paytable information.

The player can press the left and right arrow buttons to access the in-game information. Pressing the ‘X’ button will return the player to the main game interface.

Accessing the paytable will allow the player to toggle the sounds on/off via the settings button, located on the left-hand side of the paytable. On a device that is compatible, the player can also turn on/off the vibrate functionality. On launch of the game, the default setting will be ON for both of these options. + and - buttons on ‘Total Stake’ adjust the player's Total Stake on each spin.

Paytable

Only the highest win per bet line is paid.

Line wins will pay from left to right only.

Adjustment of the stake will dynamically alter the awards in the paytable.

Game Recovery

In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc.), depending on the previous state of the game, it will either resume from the point of the last spin or display the outcome of the game already in play.

Any winnings will be correctly credited to the player account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.

All results are predetermined.

General Information

This game has a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 95.30%
For any payout which gives out fractional payments, these will be truncated to 2 decimal places.
The maximum payout in one spin in this game is capped at 250,000.00
System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.

text.description: Unlock wilds and multipliers or trigger Party Pots for a cash bonus!
text.gameInfo:
Cryptex 7 is a 3x5 slot with 20 winlines that expands to 7 reels and features a Free Spin bonus round and 3 base game modifiers.

Please note that this game is connected to the CORE JACKPOT BONUS (CJB). This game has 7% RTP allocated to the CJB.

Each press of PLAY will action each reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching some 2 of-a-kind and all 3, 4 or 5 of-a-kind symbols.

All wins are paid left to right. All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning with the far left.

All wins shown on different win lines will be shown and paid to the player.

The Wild symbol can substitute for ALL other symbols EXCEPT scatter symbols to help create a line win. Using a wild symbol to complete a line does not incur any extra multiplier other than the win for the symbol(s) it substitutes. Only the highest paying win on each line will be counted.

During the base game modifiers and the free spins event, the 5 reels can expand to 7 reels in total.

Set Your Stake

The player can choose their stake by pressing the “+” and “-” buttons on the left of the screen. The stake will be shown in the Total Stake meter.

Features

During the game, the reels may change and modify a spin with one of three base game modifiers.

Wild Reel modifier: During the main game, on random occasions, a modifier can activate a mechanical effect to reveal an extra reel to the left of the conventional 5 reels. The player will now be presented with 6 reels. This new first reel will contain stacked wilds which will give the player a much greater chance of creating a win, as wins will be paid for 3 of a kind on 2 symbols on the 2nd and 3rd reels on a winline because of the new wilds. Also, the reel will be populated with the 2 top paying symbols.

Multiplier Reel modifier: During the main game, the reels may shudder and activate a mechanical effect to reveal a further reel to the right of the conventional 5 reels. The player will now be presented with 6 reels. This new last reel will contain various multipliers. This extra reel  can significantly alter the values of the wins compared to the normal base game spins. This new last reel will be distributed with multipliers which will also spin through the reel apertures. If a win is created via a connecting winline, then where the winline ends on this reel will award that multiplier and times that value too.

Wild and Multiplier Reels modifier: During the main game, on random occasions, the reels will shudder and activate a mechanical effect revealing a further 2 reels left and right of the conventional 5 reels. The player now will be presented with 7 reels (as per freespins). The first reel will contain stacked wilds with top symbols and the last and 7th reel will contain multipliers. Both of these extra reels significantly alter the frequency and the values of the wins compared to the normal base game spins.

If 3 bonus scatter symbols land on reels 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5, then this triggers the Free Spins feature.

If 4 or 5 bonus trigger symbols land, then the more free spins are given for each extra symbol.

3 Scatter symbols = 5 initial Freespins

4 Scatter symbols = 10 initial Freespins

5 Scatter symbols = 25 initial Freespins

Once the feature has been triggered the reels will expand left and right to reveal 2 further reels either end of the conventional 5 reels. The furthest left reel (now reel 1) will contain stacked wilds 3 high which will spin through the reel aperture. This reel will also be populated with the 2 highest paying symbols. The furthest right reel (now reel 7) will contain a series of multipliers. Any connecting win going through the win line will connect to one of the 3 multipliers shown in the last reel aperture.

Free Spins feature: The player now will be presented with 7 reels. The first reel will contain stacked wilds/high paying symbols and the last and 7th reel will contain multipliers. Both of these extra reels significantly alter the frequency and the values of the wins compared to the normal base game spins.

The player will get an initial amount of Free Spins from bonus symbols, however during the ‘Free Spins’ the scatter bonus symbols will still be present on the reels. If 2 or more scatter symbols land anywhere in view on the 5 reels then further ‘Free Spins’ are re-triggered (see table values below).

Scatter Bonuses:
From Freegame No of Spins Retrig'd
x2 Scat 2
x3 Scat 5
x4 Scat 10
x5 Scat 25
Any 2.45 


All wins will be relative to current total bet and the base game paytable.

Core Jackpots Bonus

Please note that this game is connecting to the CORE JACKPOT BONUS (CJB). This game has 7% RTP allocated to the CJB. This is a 7 stage bonus game which can trigger 7 progressive global jackpots which are incremented by ANY Core Gaming content that is designed to plug into this system. This is branded ‘Party Pots’.

During any spin on the game a firework rocket may shoot up from the Party Pots area located at the bottom of the screen. If this explodes then the Party Pots feature has been activated.

In each level (Party), the player will be prompted to pick from 26 stars. The player can find the following;

CASH - a cash value that gets added to your total win.

JACKPOT - Win the current progressive amount for the ‘Party’ in play.

COLLECT - ends the party event.

TICKET - Gain 3 VIP tickets to be upgraded to the next party.

It is possible to be upgraded through all 7 parties. The party event is only over if the player finds ‘COLLECT’.

A progressive pot is only available to be won during the correlating Party ‘pick me’ level.

Progressive Party pots: During each standard reel spin a proportion of the money staked is added to each cashpot. There are seven progressive pots which are:

House Party pot: seeded at £50

Pool Party pot: seeded at £100

Club Party pot: seeded at £200

Beach Party pot: seeded at £500

Boat Party pot: seeded at £1,000

Concert Party pot: seeded at £5,000

Vegas Party pot: seeded at £15,000

The progressive party pots consists of a fixed minimum amount which gradually increases by a percentage of funds inputted into the game until it is won. When a party pot is won, it is reset to the seed amount and begins to rise again.

The progressive party pots are available in "Real Play" only.

Winning a progressive party pot neither contributes to, or is affected by, the daily cumulative winnings limit.

All players contribute 0.1% of each bet placed to each progressive pot on every game (0.7% in total).

Party Pots progressive pots payout will be rounded down to 2 decimal points.

All players are eligible to win the progressive party pots on every game.

It is not possible for two players to simultaneously win the party pots. The party pot is locked when it is being won. This means that no other bets will be accepted for it and only one player at a time is able to win it.

In the event of a non-responsive game or problem during a draw, the game will repeat the incomplete draw and display the result to the player when the game is next launched.

In the event of equipment failure or planned/unplanned terminations, progressive party pot parameters, (including cashpot values and incremental percentages), are fully restored with identical parameters, after re-start.

System malfunction voids all pays and plays.

Buttons

Pressing the rotating arrow icon, above the ‘PLAY’ arrow button, will open a dialogue panel from which the player can access the autoplay options.

Pressing the ‘menu’ button icon, on the right-hand side above the ‘Auto Play’ button, will open the information from which the player can access the paytable information. The player can press the arrows back and forth to access all other game information. Pressing the ‘X’ button will exit the information and return the player to the main game interface.

Accessing the ‘cog’ button will allow the player access to toggle the sounds on/off and, on compatible devices, the player can also turn on/off the vibrate function. On launch of the game, the default setting will be ON for both of these options.
“+” and “-” buttons on ‘Total Stake’ adjust the player's total stake on each spin.

Paytable

Only the highest win per bet line is paid.

Line wins will pay from left to right only.

Adjustment of the stake will dynamically alter the awards in the paytable.

Game Recovery

In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc.), depending on the previous state of the game, it will either resume from the point of the last spin or display the outcome of the game already in play. The current multiplier on that stake will also be displayed.

Any winnings will be correctly credited to the player account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.

General Information

This game has a theoretical Return to Player (RTP) of 95.01%. Inclusive of the Core Jackpot ‘Party Pots’ bonus.

The maximum payout in one spin in this game including the ‘Party Pots’ feature is capped at 250,000, excluding the ‘Party

Pots’ progressive Jackpots.

Progressive Jackpots can exceed £250,000.

System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.

Due to high production values of this game, lower-tier hardware may run into compatibility issues and, in certain instances, you will not be able to play.

Copyright

© 2017 CORE Gaming Limited. All rights reserved.

Unauthorised copying of any images or content by any means is not permitted.

text.description: Strike GOLD in this diamond digging extravaganza with MEGAWAYS!
text.gameInfo:
Diamond Mine is a 6-reel slot featuring MEGAWAYS™. Strike GOLD in this diamond digging extravaganza with up to 117,649 ways to win, Cascading symbols and an Unlimited Win Multiplier during Free Spins, which increases after every win. Watch out for the TNT Symbol, all in view will explode to reveal the same random symbol for even more ways to find your fortune!

Step 1: Getting Started

  1. Press the TOTAL BET button to increase or decrease the amount of your TOTAL BET. Select from the list of available stakes from the Total Bet options (depending on Operator configuration and currency equivalent).
  2. Press 'SPIN' to start your game.
  3. There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically. If you wish to cancel this during your auto spins, press the Stop Autoplay button.

Step 2: How To Play

  • Press 'SPIN' to start the game.
  • The reels will spin and eventually stop at random.
  • If the combination of symbols appearing on the reels forms a line of 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6 matching symbols (starting from the left most reel) on any of the MEGAWAYS™, then you win. Any winnings you have will be highlighted causing an explosion and more symbols will cascade in.
  • Winnings will be credited to your account balance.

Cascading Symbols

  • All winning symbols will cause a chain reaction.
  • The winning symbols will be removed from the reels and replaced by new symbols coming from above the reels.
  • There are symbol positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5. They help form wins and are the only positions that can reveal Wild Symbols. These will be replaced from the right.
  • Cascades will continue until no more winning symbols are generated.

MEGAWAYS™

  • Each reel can reveal up to 7 symbols in view.
  • Each spin can have up to 117,649 ways to win.
  • A win is matching consecutive symbols, regardless of height, from left to right starting from the left most reel.
  • All winning combinations are added together.
  • Payouts are multiplied by stake.
  • MEGAWAYS™ under licence from Big Time Gaming.

Wild Symbol

  • The Wild Symbol can only appear in the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5.
  • The Wild Symbol can be used to help form wins by substituting for other symbol excluding scatter symbols.
  • Only the highest win is paid per winning combination.

TNT Symbol

  • The TNT Symbol can appear in any position.
  • All TNT Symbols in view will reveal the same random symbol.
  • The TNT Symbol cannot reveal scatter symbols.

Scatter

  • The Scatter Symbol can appear in any of the reels but not in the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5.
  • 4 Scatter Symbols in view awards 12 Free Spins. Every additional Scatter Symbol adds an extra 5 Free Spins.
  • Scatter wins are awarded in addition to reel wins.

Free Spins

  • During Free Spins there is an Unlimited Win Multiplier active which starts at 1 and is increased by 1 after every Cascade.
  • During Free Spins the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 can reveal Free Spins Scatters and will award extra Free Spins.
  • 3 Free Spins Scatters = 5 extra Free Spins.
  • 4 Free Spins Scatters = 10 extra Free Spins.
  • The stake that was used to trigger the Free Spins will be used for the Free Spins duration.
  • At the end of Free Spins, the total winnings for the spins will be displayed. Any winnings will be credited to the players account and regular play then resumes.

Auto Play

  • There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically.
  • By selecting 'AUTOPLAY' you can choose to place up to 100 bets automatically, one after the other.
  • Select your stake as normal then press the 'AUTOPLAY' button to select the number of 'Autoplay' bets you want to play.
  • Select your Loss Limit (maximum amount willing to lose for the autoplay session) and then press PLAY to begin your autoplays (other options are available).
  • Auto Play will turn off if you get into any bonus round including Free Spins, if you reach the set Loss Limit or if a Progressive pot is awarded (where applicable).
  • You can stop Auto Play from continuing onto the next spin by clicking the 'STOP' button.

Payout Information and Game Rules

  • The maximum win from a single game is £250,000 or 10,000xBet - whichever is reached first (or currency equivalent. Other Operator limits may apply).
  • MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PLAYS AND PAYS.
  • This game has a theoretical return to player of 96.43%.

Applicable date from: 19/04/2018

GameData.name: Deal Or No Deal: Go All The Way

text.description: A 5-reel 5-line slot inspired by the classic pub fruits. The game has 16 features and a range of cash prizes to be won as well as the classic Deal or No Deal game
text.gameInfo:
Deal Or No Deal: Go All The Way is a 5-reel 5-line slot inspired by the classic pub fruits. The game has 16 features and a range of cash prizes to be won as well as the classic Deal or No Deal game. Will you have what it takes to Go All The Way?

Step 1: Getting Started

  1. Click the STAKE button to increase or decrease the amount of your STAKE. Select from the list of available stakes from the STAKE options (depending on Operator configuration and currency equivalent).
  2. Click 'START' to start your game.
  3. There is an is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically. If you wish to cancel this during your auto spins then simply press the Stop Autoplay button.

Step 2: How To Play

  • Press 'START' to start the game.
  • The reels will spin and eventually stop at random.
  • If the combination of symbols appearing on the reels forms a line of 3, 4 or 5 matching symbols (wins pays adjacent) on one of the win lines, then you win. Any winning lines you have will be highlighted and your winnings will be credited to your account balance.
  • Collecting any numbers on the reels increases the trail amount. Any more than 8 triggers the SUPER BOARD while getting 4 on the trail triggers the BONUS.

Triggering the BONUS will cause a dapple awarding either:

Stopper: This causes a Stopper, highlighting different locations around the board and wherever it lands is awarded to the player.

Boost:: This boosts the player further down the trail.

Win Spin: The reels spin to a prize.

Triggering the SUPER BOARD Trail will initiate the top game. From this point a series of Features and Cash prizes can be won. Gamble on one of the three Hi Lo reels to win Features, Cash or a move around the Trail Bonus Board.

The Trail Bonus Board awards one of the following:

  • Feature+: Increases the feature board on the left.
  • Cash+: Increases the cash board on the right.
  • Free Spin: Awards an additional Free Spin. Winnings are put into the cashpot.
  • Phone: Collect three or more to Enter the Deal or No Deal Bonus.
  • Bonus: Awards a Bonus.
  • Multi Add: Awards features, cash, adds to cashpot or extra telephones.
  • Box 23: Pick a box to reveal a prize.
  • Trail Run: Awards features, cash, adds to cashpot or extra telephones by moving around the board.

Features

There are 16 features possible, all in view on the left hand side of the game. Upon being collected they will apply the following action:

  • BIG MONEY - The game transitions to a big money screen with 10 gold boxes displaying values ranging from 100 to 1000 x Bet. The values begin to shuffle about as the boxes close. After all the boxes have closed the player is prompted to select a gold box and win the corresponding prize.
  • POWERPLAY - The base reels shall spin to a win then a repeat YES/NO is given. If yes, the reels spin to another win.
  • BIG SHOT - The top 5 values dapple of the cash ladder. The player presses start to stop the dapple and is awarded the corresponding prize.
  • BANK ON IT - A random dapple across the 3 numbers on the Hi Lo Reels which awards the corresponding number of Cash Knockouts. The knockouts will climb the ladder incrementally.
  • CASH COMBO - All the values dapple on the cash ladder. The player presses start to stop the dapple and is awarded the corresponding prize. A repeat YES/NO is then awarded, if yes another cash value is awarded.
  • STAR PRIZE - The game brings up 3 blue boxes which the player picks from to reveal CLIMB 1, 2, 3 or collect. Revealing a climb will advance up the cash ladder.
  • BIG REDS - A random dapple across the Red DOND values. The player presses spin to stop the dapple and wins the corresponding prize.
  • MONEY MAKER - The Hi Lo Reels spins and player presses spin to stop. The 3 numbers are then added together and paid (i.e. 1 + 4 + 2 = 7 x bet)
  • CASH VAULT - A random dapple across the 3 numbers on the Hi Lo Reels which awards the corresponding number of knockouts on the DOND values.
  • BOX CLEVER - Brings up 3 DOND red boxes and the player picks one to reveal a prize.
  • CRAZY CASH - The base game reels spin and the player presses SPIN to stop the reels. The numbers in view climb the cash ladder by the corresponding number of segments..
  • POWER 5 - 5 Shots given to climb the cash ladder.
  • MONEY BOX - Brings up 3 blue boxes and the player picks one to reveal a prize.
  • TURBO GAMBLE - A gamble up/down on the cash ladder.
  • HOT SHOT - A random dapple across the blue DOND boxes. The player presses spin to stop the dapple and wins the corresponding prize. A repeat YES/No will be given on the win.
  • CHERRY WIN - The base game reels shall spin to a winning Cherry combination.

Deal or No Deal

  • Collecting 3 Deal or No Deal telephones whilst travelling around the Trail Bonus Board will activate the Deal or No Deal Feature. Once active the player can choose to enter the Deal or No Deal Feature or play on with the chance to upgrade the Deal or No Deal bonus. Collecting 5 telephones activates Super Deal or No Deal where the bottom 5 paddles are eliminated from play and collecting 6 telephones activates Mega Deal or No Deal where all the blue paddles are eliminated.

Auto Play

  • There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically.
  • By selecting 'AUTOPLAY' you can choose to place up to 100 bets automatically, one after the other.
  • Select your stake as normal then press the 'AUTOPLAY' button to select the number of 'Autoplay' bets you want to play.
  • (The following additional functions are also applicable depending on jurisdiction)
  • Select your Loss Limit (maximum amount willing to lose for the autoplay session) and then press PLAY to begin your autoplays (other options are available).
  • Auto Play will turn off if you get into any bonus round including Freespins, if you reach the set Loss Limit or if a Progressive pot is awarded (where applicable).
  • You can stop Auto Play from continuing onto the next spin by clicking the 'STOP' button.

Payout Information and Game Rules

  • Line wins are multiplied by the players total bet.
  • Wins on different paylines are added.
  • All line pay symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive adjacent reels (5 lines always active). Only the highest line win is paid on each line.
  • The RTP of the game ranges from 40.58% to 97.36% depending on the strategy used. The highest RTP figure is based on long term best strategy (play to 'cash out' during the feature game; accept no offers during the 'Deal or No Deal' feature).
  • MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PLAYS AND PAYS.

The maximum win from a single game is £250,000 or 10,000xBet - whichever is reached first (or currency equivalent. Other Operator limits may apply).

Applicable date from: 06/11/2018

text.description: Match icons on our latest tap card, with 3 jackpots up for grabs!
text.gameInfo:
Dragon Born Tapcard™ is a classic feel scratch card for the digital age.

Tapcard™
A Tapcard™ game can have between 7 and to 16 icons per card. Prizes are paid for 3, 4 and 5 icon matches and multiple icons can win per card.

How to play
Bet per card is fixed and displayed on the card.

Auto play
To set up Auto play press the Auto button. This will display Auto play panel which the player can use to modify the number of spins, set a loss limit or set a win limit. When a loss limit has been set the player can select Start to commence auto play.

When Auto play is on, the Play button will change to a Stop button. The remaining Auto plays will be displayed in the Stop button. The player can cancel Auto play by clicking the Stop button. Auto play will stop automatically if any of the limits set is reached or a jackpot is won.

Start the game
Press the Play button to display a new card.
The tap areas will reveal either an icon or more tap areas as they are tapped. When no tap areas remain, the result will be displayed.

Icon Wins
Payouts are for 3 or more matching revealed icons, regardless of size, in any positions.
All winning combinations are added together.
Payouts are set amounts per play.
Only the highest win is paid on each winning combination.

Wild Icon
The Wild icon substitutes for every icon including Jackpot icon.

Jackpot Icon
There are 3 different progressive jackpots available in the game. They are triggered from different numbers of Jackpot icons in a single card:

Maxi Jackpot - won by 5 Jackpot icons in a single card
Midi Jackpot - won by 4 Jackpot icons in a single card
Mini Jackpot - won by 3 Jackpot icons in a single card

General Information

 

  • This game has a theoretical return to player of of 92.32%.

Progressive Jackpot

  • Progressive jackpots consists of a fixed minimum amount (start-up seed) which gradually increases by a percentage of funds (contributions) inputted into the game until it is won. When a jackpot is won, it is reset to the seed amount and begins to rise again.
  • The progressive jackpots are initially funded by a mini £600 / midi £3,000 / major £30,000 start-up seed value. This is topped up by contributions of 2.3% from stakes on the game split mini 1%/ midi 0.8%/ major 0.5% across the pots and there is no ceiling value.
  • Total return to player from the progressive jackpot is 10.9%. This is split 8.6% contribution to the jackpot and 2.3% to reseeding once the jackpot has been won. This makes up part of the total game return to player which is given separately.
  • The progressive jackpot is available in "real play" only. There are no eligibility requirements for the progressive jackpot, all players are eligible to win.
  • The progressive jackpot is determined via the jackpot icons, more details on this can be found in the How to Play section above.  Jackpot prizes can occur after any spin with the chances of winning increasing/decreasing proportionally to the bet size.
  • Jackpot prizes are awarded via bank transfer following confirmation with the games supplier and necessary identity and payment verification.
  • In the unlikely event of concurrent progressive winners, the system will determine the first winner, who will win the full jackpot value. The second player is informed that the jackpot has been won by another player and is offered the chance to cancel the bet. Only one Jackpot can be won per game.

    • In the event of a non-responsive game or problem during play, the game will display the incomplete result to the player when the game is next launched.
    • Incomplete games will become void after 90 days and will be forfeited to charity.
    • System malfunction voids all pays and plays.
    13/04/2017

text.gameInfo:
Egyptian Queen slot is a 25 winline 5X3 slot with a further set of 3 horizontally spinning reels sitting above that react with the game. The game utilises these top set of 3 reels which mirror the reel positions on the base game in order to implement 3 base game reel modifiers and a Free Spins bonus game.

This game is portrait in orientation only.

How to Play

Set your stake: On the bottom of the screen, the player can choose their stake by pressing the + and - buttons. The stake will be shown in the Total Stake meter.

Each press of PLAY will action each bottom reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching 3, 4 or 5 of-a-kind symbols on winlines.

Line wins pay left to right. All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning from the leftmost reel.

All wins shown on different winlines will be shown and paid to the player.

Wild symbols(W, BW): The Wild symbol (W) can substitute for ALL other symbols EXCEPT the scatter symbols (S). However, ‘Bonus Wild’ symbols (BW) can substitute for ALL other symbols, including scatter bonus symbols except the ‘Eye of the Horus’ symbol.

Using Wild symbols (W, BW) to complete a line does not incur any extra multiplier, unless stated as a multiplier, other than the win for the symbol(s) they substitute. Only the highest paying win on each line will be counted.

Bonus Scatter Symbols (S): These symbols can appear on reels 1,2, 3, 4 & 5. Two scatter symbols on the reels will trigger an anticipation on the next reel. Three or more scatter symbols will trigger the bonus Free Spins feature.

To award the bonus feature, the player needs at least 3 Bonus trigger symbols and/or ‘Bonus Wild’ symbols.

  • 3 x Bonus symbol = 10 Free Spins + 1x stake win.
  • 4 x Bonus symbol =10 Free Spins + 10x stake win.
  • 5 x Bonus symbol = 10 Free Spins + 50x stake win.

Game Features

During the base game, game if a player lands a ‘spin’ (Eye of Horus) symbol on reel 5 they will receive a spin on the lowest bonus wheel before any wins get paid. This wheel will contain ‘Wild Reel’ symbols (WR) and/or Blanks.

If a ‘Wild Reel’ symbol (WR) appears it will convert the reel directly below to a Wild reel and then pay any subsequent wins.

The 2 higher bonus wheels are only in play during the random modifiers and the Free S

If a top reel Wild drops and lands on top of a Bonus Scatter Symbol, the position will become a Bonus Wild symbol (BW), which substitutes for all other symbols.

Base Game Modifiers

During the base game, on EVERY spin, there will be a chance that the ‘Eye of Horus’ atop of the bonus reels will glow and show a ‘Pick Me’ from 3 coins to award one of the following modifiers, (these do not guarantee a win):

Wild Treasure:

The 3 bonus wheels start spinning and contain only Wilds or blanks on the reels. Once the 3 bonus wheels stop, the player will see a pattern of Wilds on the 3 bonus wheels. Wherever the pattern of Wilds appear on the bonus wheels, would then effectively appear on the base game as Wild overlays before the base game reels then conclude awarding any wins using the random Wild patterns now in play.

Reel Treasure:

The 3 bonus wheels start spinning and contain only cash values or blanks on the reels. Once the 3 bonus wheels stop, the player will see a pattern of cash on the 3 bonus wheels. These values will then be added up and contribute to the total win. This does guarantee an instant win and is not exclusive of any natural spinning win.

Queen’s Treasure:

This is the rarest modifier. The 3 bonus wheels start spinning, however the very top wheel will turn into a ‘Mega Multiplier’ wheel. This wheel will contain a variety of values distributed on all the symbol positions. The range will be between x2 and x100 multipliers. The other bottom two wheels will contain only Wilds, blanks and on wheel 2 (middle wheel) a ‘Mega Multiplier’ symbol.

Once the 3 bonus wheels stop, the player will see a pattern of Wilds on the 2 bonus wheels. Wherever the pattern of Wilds appear on the bonus wheels, any that are directly above a base game reel will turn that corresponding reel ‘Wild’. Should the random wheels stop so that there are 2 ‘Wilds’ stacked above a reel, then this will turn that corresponding reel ‘Wild’ but also x2. Any connecting win through this x2 Wild reel will double the win. Landing the ‘Mega Multiplier’ symbol will spin the very top bonus wheel. There will be a clear win aperture centre of the top wheel.

Once this ‘Mega Multiplier’ wheel comes to a halt the multiplier that is directly centre on the wheel in the win aperture will multiply any total win on the base game.

Free Spins

In the Free Spin bonus round, the player will start with a fixed number of 10 Free Spins and these will play out individually like normal spins. Bonus symbols are not present during Free Spins. Additional Free Spins can be gained via the middle bonus reel.

If the player lands a ‘spin’ (Eye of Horus) symbol anywhere in the aperture on reel 5 during Free Spins, the bottom 2 bonus wheels will spin together, increasing the prize potential.

The bottom bonus wheel will remain as it is in base game with either ‘Wild’ reels or blanks.

The middle bonus wheel will include Wilds, blanks and a ‘Mega Multiplier’ symbol. Should the random wheels stop so that there are 2 ‘Wilds’ stacked above a reel, then this will turn that corresponding reel ‘Wild’ but also x2. Any connecting win through this x2 Wild reel will double that win. Any other stacked ‘Wilds’ on the bonus wheels will also turn into Wild reels X2.

Populated on Bonus wheel 2 (middle wheel) are ‘Mega Multiplier’ and extra Free Spins segments.

Landing the ‘Mega Multiplier’ symbol will spin the very top bonus wheel, the top wheel contains high multipliers between X2 and X100. There will be a clear win aperture centre of the top wheel. Once this ‘Mega Multiplier’ wheel comes to a halt the multiplier that is directly centre on the wheel in the win aperture will multiply any total win on the base game.

All Free Spins wins will be relative to current total bet and the base game P

Buttons

Pressing the rotating arrow icon, next to the PLAY button, will open the Autoplay functionality.

Pressing the ‘settings’ button, on the right-side of the PLAY button, will open the Paytable information. The player can press the left and right arrow buttons to access the in-game information. Pressing the ‘X’ button will return the player to the main game interface.

Accessing the Paytable will allow the player to toggle the sounds on/off via the settings button, located on the left-hand side of the Paytable. On a device that is compatible, the player can also turn on/off the vibrate functionality. On launch of the game, the default setting will be ON for both of these options.

+ and - buttons on ‘Total Stake’ adjust the player's Total Stake on each spin.

Paytable

Only the highest win per bet line is paid.

Line wins will pay from left to right only.

Adjustment of the stake will dynamically alter the awards in the Paytable.

Game Recovery

In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc.), depending on the previous state of the game, it will either resume from the point of the last spin or display the outcome of the game already in play.

Any winnings will be correctly credited to the player account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.

All results are predetermined.

General Information

This game has a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 95.10%

For any payout which gives out fractional payments, these will be truncated to 2 decimal places.

The maximum payout in one spin in this game is capped at 250,000.00

System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.

Due to high production values of this game, lower-tier hardware may run into compatibility issues and, in certain instances, you will not be able to play.

Copyright

© 2018 CORE Gaming Limited. All rights reserved.

Unauthorised copying of any images or content by any means is not permitted.

text.description:
Hot wins with Flamin' Elles' 
Flaming Wilds
text.gameInfo:
Flamin’ Elle

A 6 reel slot, 4 symbols high, with 40 winlines. The game has 4 ‘Flamin’ Wild’ Free Spins bonus rounds . The slot also features ‘Flamin’ Wild’ base game modifiers.

  • Set your stake: At the left of the screen, the player can choose their stake by pressing the + and - buttons. The chosen stake will be shown in the Total Stake meter.
  • Each press of PLAY will action each reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching 3, 4, 5 or 6 of-a-kind symbols on .
  • Line wins pay left to right. All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning from the leftmost reel.
  • All wins shown on different winlines will be shown and paid to the player.
  • Wild symbols: The Wild symbol can substitute for ALL other symbols EXCEPT the scatter symbols. Using Wild symbols to complete a line does not incur any extra multiplier, unless stated as a multiplier, other than the win for the symbol(s) they substitute. Only the highest paying win on each line will be counted.
  • Bonus Scatter Symbols: symbols can appear on any reel. Three or more bonus symbolsin view will trigger the bonus Free Spins feature.
  • 3 Bonus symbols award - 7 Free Spins.
  • 4 Bonus symbols award - 7 Free Spins + 5x stake win.
  • 5 Bonus symbols award - 7 Free Spins + 20x stake win.
  • 6 Bonus symbols award - 7 Free Spins + 50x stake win. 

Base Game Modifiers

  • During the base game, on EVERY spin at random, the base reels may spin longer than usual and Elle will drink some fuel and blow flames onto the reels. There will be, at random, between 4 and 10 Flamin’ Wilds’ blown onto the reels.
  • These modifiers don’t guarantee a win, but any wins will be paid to the player.

Free Spins

  • During Free Spins, there can be bonus scatter symbols land which will trigger extra Free Spins. The amount of extra Free Spins will depend on the amount of bonus trigger symbols in view on that spin (see values below):
    • 2 scatters = 3 extra Free Spins
    • 3 scatters = 5 extra Free Spins
    • 4 scatters = 7 extra Free Spins
    • 5 scatters = 10 extra Free Spins
    • 6 scatters = 15 extra Free Spins
  • Flamin’ Riches: Elle will take a swig of fuel and blow only one flame out covering the reels. On each and every Free Spin, Elle will drink more fuel/breath in more/blow a longer flame per spin.
  • On the first Free Spin, Elle will drink fuel, take a deep breath and blow a flame on to the reels. Once the fire dissipates, it will reveal 4 ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ in random positions whilst the reels are spinning. When the reels come to a halt, any resulting wins will be processed. On the next spin, Elle will drink more fuel, breathed deeper and blow a longer flame this time, revealing 5 ‘Flamin’ Wilds’. This scenario will continue upgrading the amount of ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ for all 7 Free Spins, ending with the final spin. On this final spin, Elle will pull out a flame thrower and burn the reels with a massive flame, revealing 10 ‘Flamin’ Wild’ positions. Any final wins will be processed.
  • Blaze it Up: The same game mechanic will apply. Elle will take a swig of fuel and blow one flame out covering the reels. On each and every Free Spin, Elle will drink fuel, breath in and blow a flame per spin.
    • On the first Free Spin, Elle will drink fuel, breath and blow a flame on to the reels. Once the fire dissipates, it will reveal 4 ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ on the screen whilst the reels are spinning. When the reels come to a halt, any wins will be processed.  If there is NO win, then, on that spin, Elle will drink more fuel, breathe deeper and blow a longer flame, this time revealing 5 ‘Flamin’ Wilds’.  This scenario will continue upgrading the amount of ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ for all 7 Free Spins if there has been NO win, ending with the final spin. If at any point the ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ create a win on that spin, then on the next flame blow, the same amount of ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ will be present and there will be NO upgrade.
    • As soon as the player gets NO win, the current ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ will be upgraded to the next ‘Flamin’ Wild’ level for the subsequent Free Spin.
  • Hot or Not: Random chance of any ‘Flamin’ Wild’ scenario. On each and every Free Spin, there is a random chance Elle will drink fuel, breath in and either blow flames and award ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ or not drink any fuel and therefore award no Flamin’ Wilds. 
    • On a chance basis, the next spin may have NO ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ via Elle, or award between 4 and 10 Flamin’ Wilds.
  • Heat is On: Random Wilds distributed in pairs co-joined in parallel. On each and every Free Spin, Elle will drink fuel, breath in and blow flames to award ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ onto the reels. The Wilds may be populated via Elle performing several flame blows and there may be 2 to 6 ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ and any combination awarded during any flame blow. There will always be between 2 and 6 ‘Flamin’ Wilds’ awarded for each Free Spin, therefore Elle will burn (2-6 symbols) Wilds on each spin. This process continues until all 7 Free Spins have been exhausted.
  • All Free Spins wins will be relative to current total bet and the base game paytable.

Buttons

  • Pressing the rotating arrow icon, next to the PLAY button, will open the Autoplay functionality.
  • Pressing the ‘settings’ button, on the right-hand side of the base game screen, will open the paytable information. The player can press the left and right arrow buttons to access the in-game information. Pressing the ‘X’ button will return the player to the main game interface.
  • Accessing the paytable will allow the player to toggle the sounds on/off via the settings button, located on the left-hand side of the paytable. On a device that is compatible, the player can also turn on/off the vibrate functionality. On launch of the game, the default setting will be ON for both of these options.
  • + and - buttons on ‘Total Stake’ adjust the player's Total Stake on each spin.

Paytable

  • Only the highest win per bet line is paid.
  • Line wins will pay from left to right only.
  • Adjustment of the stake will dynamically alter the awards in the paytable.

Game Recovery

  • In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc.), depending on the previous state of the game, it will either resume from the point of the last spin or display the outcome of the game already in play.
  • Any winnings will be correctly credited to the player account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.
  • All results are predetermined.

General Information

  • This game has a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 95.30%
  • For any payout which gives out fractional payments, these will be truncated to 2 decimal places.
  • The maximum payout in one spin in this game is capped at 250,000.00
  • System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.
  • Due to high production values of this game, lower-tier hardware may run into compatibility issues and, in certain instances, you will not be able to play.

Copyright

  • © 2019 CORE Gaming Limited. All rights reserved.
  • Unauthorised copying of any images or content by any means is not permitted.

text.gameInfo:
Selecting Your Bet

Increase your total bet using the plus button (a rectangular button with a ‘+’) and decrease your total bet using the minus button (a rectangular button with a ‘-’). Use the start button (a circular button with one arrow) to spin the reels.

Pay Table

All win values shown in-game are based on the bet amount.

Pay Ways

There are up to 25,088 pay ways available. Reels start with 3, 4, 4, 4, 3 symbols in view (576 pay ways). Reels can randomly expand up to 7, 8, 8, 8, 7 symbols in view (25,088 pay ways).

Special Symbols

WILD symbol: Substitutes for all symbols except the following scatter symbols: Both FREE SPINS symbols: Any 3 in view awards Free Spins. Both DRAGON symbols: Any 3 in view awards the Dragon Feature. GOLD COIN symbol: Any in view awards a spot prize.

Gold Zone

The central symbols on reels 2, 3 and 4 affect how the scatter symbols behave. FREE SPINS symbols give double the spins. DRAGON symbols give double awards. GOLD COIN symbols give double awards.

Free Spins

Any 3 FREE SPINS symbols in view awards Free Spins. RED FREE SPINS symbol: awards +3 free spins. GOLD FREE SPINS symbol: awards +6 free spins. Free spins can be re-triggered. A Progressive Reel Expansion operates during free spins. GOLD COIN awards 10x to 25x and double in the Gold Zone.

Dragon Feature

Any 3 DRAGON symbols in view awards the Dragon Feature. BLUE DRAGON symbol: Single Award Lantern. GOLD DRAGON symbol: Double Award Lantern. Awards are given for each lantern destroyed.

Re-spin

Bonus Any 3 mixed DRAGON and FREE SPINS symbols in the Gold Zone award a re-spin. A re-spin has the chance to award Free Spins or the Dragon Feature.

Game Information

The information button (a rectangular button with an ‘i’) will display the pay table and game information pages.

Autoplay Settings

The autoplay menu button (a circular button with three arrows) will allow the autoplay settings to be adjusted. In accordance with UKGC guidelines, the settings in this menu control the ‘Bet per Play’, the ‘Number of Plays’ and the ‘Loss Limit’. Optionally, a ‘Single Win Limit’ may also be set. The ‘Number of Plays’ selectable are: 10 (initial value), 20, 50 and 100. ‘Start’ will initiate autoplay. Previously set autoplay values may be reloaded with ‘Last Settings’ and ‘Reset’ will clear all values. Autoplay will stop automatically if either the Loss Limit or Single Win Limit criteria are met. The autoplay stop button (a circular button with a square) will stop autoplay at the end of the current game.

Win Rules

All reel wins are paid according to the pay table. The WILD symbol substitutes for all symbols except the scatter symbols. Only the highest win per pay way is awarded. All symbols pay from left to right except scatter symbols. Multiple wins in a single game are added to the total win. £250,000.00 is the maximum win available from any single game.

Game Recovery

In the event of a game not being completed due to interruption, the game will display the outcome of the interrupted game upon reconnection with the game server. All winnings allocated to the interrupted game will be credited to the player account.

This game has a theoretical Return To Player (RTP) of 96.18%.

System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.

Any game played in demonstration (or free) play mode does not use a player’s own funds.

Copyright

Game design copyright © 2018 Live 5 Gaming Limited – all rights reserved. Unauthorised copying of any images, icons, layout or content by any means is strictly prohibited. Information last updated 10/12/2018.

text.gameInfo:
The Frog of fortune slot is a 20 winline 5X3 slot with an arcade ‘Frogger’ style free spin feature with a ‘super spin’ at the end of the feature bonus. This game has also 7 base game reel modifiers.

Set your stake: On the left of the screen, the player can choose their stake by pressing the + and - buttons. The stake will be shown in the Total Stake meter.

Each press of PLAY will action each reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching 3, 4 or 5 of-a-kind symbols and also 2 of-a-kind Wild and Logo symbols on winlines.

Line wins pay left to right. All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning from the far left.

All wins shown on different winlines will be shown and paid to the player.

Wild symbol: The Wild symbol can substitute for ALL other symbols EXCEPT scatter symbols to help create a line win. Using a wild symbol to complete a line does not incur any extra multiplier other than the win for the symbol(s) it substitutes. Only the highest paying win on each line will be counted.

Bonus Scatter Symbols: These symbols will trigger the bonus free spins feature and appear on reels 1, 3 & 5. Two scatter symbols on reels 1 and 3 will trigger an anticipation on the 5th reel.

Bonus Rounds:

During the base game, on EVERY spin, there will be a chance that ‘Mr Frog’ will award one of the following modifications:  

Wild Reels (Smokey Dokey Wilds):

1 to 5 reels turn Wild prior to the reels stopping. Between 1 and 4 reels in any of the 5 reel apertures can turn Wild. Any winnings once reels come to a halt are paid to the player. The Frog will activate 1 to 5 of Wild reels before the finishing positions have settled.

Random Wilds (Cotton Shakin’ Wilds):

Random Wilds appear on the reels before symbols land and award any winnings once reels come to a halt. The frog will awake, activating a number of random Wild positions before finishing positions have settled.

Mega Symbol (Mega Pickin’ Symbol):

Either reels 1/2/3, 2/3/4 or 3/4/5 will turn into a colossal symbol, which can be anything from the award card, (except scatter Bonus symbols). This symbol will cover 3 whole reels and will act the same way as if there were 9 individual symbols. Mr Frog will activate a colossus symbol to cover either reels 1-3, 2-4 or 3-5 and will land before finishing positions have settled.

Random Multiplier (Rootin’ Tootin’ Multiplier):

The frog will trigger a random multiplier for any payouts on this particular spin only. Mr Frog will let out an enormous burp and a multiplier will float from his mouth whilst the reels are spinning. Once the reels have stopped, any wins are times by the multiplier shown.

Bonus Chance (Bonus Diggin’ Chance):

For this spin, there is a greater chance of triggering the bonus. Mr Frog will start to throw extra bonus symbols onto reels 1 and 3 during the spin. The reels will begin to slow down and grind to a halt, exposing lots of Bonuses that are now populated on reels 1 and 3. There is a 50% chance that reel 5 will then trigger the Free Spins bonus round.

Bonus Rewind:

During the main game, if the Free Spins trigger symbols come in on reels 1 and 3, which in turn create an anticipation on reel 5, Mr Frog will awake and occasionally he will whistle and rewind the reel so that the Free Spins trigger symbol is activated by being visible in the reel 5 window.

Cash Bugs:

Mr Frog will notice bugs arriving and buzzing around the screen. Each of them will have cash prize multipliers associated to them. If Mr Frog splats one of them, it will award the player a win separate from any reel win. Wins will vary between x2 and x50 of the players current stake.

Frogs Free Spins:

On triggering the feature, the player will be awarded 14 Free Spins and 1 Super Spin. The player will be presented with a river shown from above.

During the Free Spins, moving objects, (lily pads and logs), will appear, moving from both left to right and right to left across the reels. The top and bottom row will have at random, logs moving right to left and the middle row will have lily pads moving left to right. If a ‘Frog’ Wild symbol lands on a log or a lily pad, they will pay associated winlines but then ‘stick’ on that object and float left/right accordingly per spin.

Wild Frogs that do not land on an object will ‘splash’ into the water. They will still contribute to a winline but will spin off every spin. ‘Wild Frogs’ that land on objects remain ‘Wild’ (sticky) in play and travel across the reels with the log or lily pad.

When the (sticky) ‘Wild Frog’ symbols move off to the right or left of screen, they will be collected. All ‘Wild Frog’ symbols that move off left or right of the reels will be stored, so they can enrich the ‘Super Spin’ event after the final Free Spin.

The amount of ‘Wilds Frogs’ collected left of the screen will correlate to the amount of Wilds added to the reels for the final ‘Super Spin’.
