text.description: Play Video Poker on your phone or tablet.
text.gameInfo:
Introduction

Video Poker is a faithful reproduction of the popular poker product.

●        Standard video poker rules

●        Up to 20 selectable hands

●        A full deck is used for each hand which is shuffled after each game

●        Switchable hi-tech and 90’s retro themed interface

●        Your winnings will be credited to your account immediately

●        You will lose your stake amount if you lose the game

How to play

When the game first loads, tap either the ‘Modern’ or ‘RETRO’ buttons located centrally on the game interface to select the graphic theme.

Please note: Other than the physical appearance of the game interface, the theme has no bearing on the gameplay or options.

Set your stake

Select your stake by tapping either the ‘+’ or ‘-’ buttons located to the right of the main game interface to either increase or decrease your stake per hand respectively. If the minimum or maximum stake value is reached, the respective button becomes inactive until the opposite stake button has been tapped and the limit is no longer reached.

The selected stake value is displayed in the ‘Stake’ field located vertically between the stake buttons. The total bet value is displayed in the ‘Total Bet’ field located above the ‘+’ button to the right of the game interface.

The total bet is the selected stake value multiplied by the number of selected hands to play.

Start the game

Start the game by tapping the ‘DEAL’ button located bottom right of the game interface.

The stake is deducted from the current ‘Balance’ field located top right of the game interface.

Buttons

Tap the ‘MENU’ button located top right of the game interface to access the menu section where you can view gameplay information, change the interface style, number of hands to play and set auto hold.

Tap the ‘INFO’ button to trigger the gameplay information popup. Tap the ‘left’ and ‘right’ arrow buttons located to the right of the popup to navigate backwards or forwards respectively through the available information. Tap the ‘EXIT’ button located top right of the popup to close the popup and return to the main game interface.

Tap the ‘STYLE’ button to trigger the style selection menu. Tap either the ‘Modern’ or ‘RETRO’ buttons located centrally on the game interface to select the graphic theme and close the style selection menu.

Please note: The ‘STYLE’ button is disabled when a game is in play.

To change the number of hands you wish to play from 1 to 20 (the default is 20), tap the ‘+’ or ‘-’ buttons located below the ‘HANDS’ field to the right of the menu interface. If the minimum or maximum hands value is reached, the respective button becomes inactive until the opposite hands button has been tapped and the limit is no longer reached. The number of selected hands is displayed in the ‘HANDS’ field located above the ‘+’ button.

Tap the ‘Auto Hold’ button to toggle the auto hold function on and off. With auto hold on, the game will automatically hold the best hands from all hands in play.

Tap the ‘EXIT’ button located at the top of the menu interface to close the menu and return to the standard game interface buttons.

How do you win?

Once the ‘DEAL’ button has been selected the ‘main’ cards located centrally at the bottom of the game interface turn over in quick succession from left to right to reveal their values.

The user must now tap whichever card may contribute to a winning combination to hold that card value in place. Once a card is held, that same card position and value is displayed and held in all hands in play.

Please note: If Auto Hold is selected the game selects the best combination and automatically holds the relevant cards. 

When the user is happy with his selection, he should tap the ‘DEAL’ button again to re-deal all the cards for all hands in play. Once the ‘DEAL’ button has been selected, all cards that have not been held will turn over in quick succession starting with the hand located top left and finishing with the ‘main’ hand.

As the card values are displayed for each hand in play, any winning combinations are displayed by both highlighting the combination in the payout table and via a ‘win’ overlay in front of the relevant hand. The ‘win’ overlay displays both the combination type (‘three of a kind’ for example) and the win value.

Once all card values have been revealed and any wins displayed, a ‘win’ popup is displayed centrally showing the total win value. The user can either collect the total win by tapping the ‘Collect’ button or gamble the total win by tapping the ‘Gamble’ button located at the bottom left and right of the popup respectively. The possible win value if the user wishes to gamble (double the total current win) is displayed centrally in the popup below the total win value.

If the user chooses to collect, the total win value is credited to the user’s account, the popup closes and the game reverts to its initial state ready for a new game. If the user chooses to gamble, the popup closes, the game interface is reset and the user is shown a new ‘main’ hand and invited to choose any card to reveal a value by tapping the relevant card. Once a card is revealed, in order to win, the user must select a second card to reveal which must be of a higher or equal value to the first.

If the second card is of the same value as the first - the winning card will be determined by suit: spades (high/top), clubs, hearts, diamonds - lowest/bottom)

If the gamble is won, the ‘win’ popup is once again displayed with the new total win value and possible gamble award if the user wishes to gamble once again (upto a maximum of 4 gambles).

If the gamble is lost, any win value is lost and reset, the popup closes and the game reverts to its initial state. The message ‘Sorry, bad luck, press deal to play again.’ is displayed in the ‘feedback’ panel.

Payouts

The payouts available for each card combination are located to the left of the game interface and are updated based on the chosen stake. Each payout value is a multiplier of the stake value as follows:

Card Combination

Multiplier

Royal Flush

x800

Straight Flush

x50

4 of a Kind

x25

Full House

x9

Flush

x6

Straight

x4

3 of a Kind

x3

2 Pairs

x2

Jacks or Better

x1

●        The max payout is capped at £250,000

●        All currencies are expressed in GBP. The amounts stated will apply in the user's own currency.

Game Recovery

●        In the event of a game in real play being interrupted (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser etc), any winnings will be correctly credited to your account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.

●        If the game is started but the result has not been displayed upon resumption the user will be presented with the initial game interface. If the result has been displayed but the user has not yet chosen to collect or gamble, upon resumption the user will be presented with the final result and the ‘win’ popup with the collect and gamble options. If the gamble feature has started, upon resumption the user will be presented with the previously chosen card.

●        The sequence and values of events leading to the display of the total award, may vary from the animation prior to game recovery. This will not affect the result of the game after the game has recovered.

General Information

●        This game has a Return to Player of up to 99.54%

●        System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.

●        Any unresolved bets placed but remaining undecided in incomplete games will become void after 90 days and will be forfeited to charity.

Copyright

●        © Copyright 2014 CORE Gaming Limited. – All rights reserved

●        Unauthorised copying of any images, icons, layout, or content by any means is not permitted.

text.description: £5 scratch card with, 1 in 3.02 chances to win up to £80,000
text.gameInfo:
Sky Bet Championship £5 play with an £80,000 Jackpot is a 4 panel scratch card with a set stake value.

  • 4 scratch panels per card
  • Fixed top prize value
  • Your winnings will be credited to your account immediately
  • You will lose your stake amount if you lose the game.

Set Your Stake

The stake value is set to a single value for each card and cannot be adjusted. The stake value is shown top right of the scratch card interface as below:

Sky Bet

Stake Value

Championship

£5

Start the Game

To start the game, press the ‘BUY CARD’ button, located centrally to the right of the ‘default’ scratch card interface.

Once the ‘BUY CARD’ button has been selected, there is a short reveal animation displayed before the scratch card interface changes to the ‘in play’ layout where the ‘BUY CARD’ button becomes the ‘REVEAL’ button.

The stake is deducted from the current balance, located bottom left of the scratch card interface.

Buttons

When the ‘default’ scratch card interface is displayed (before the game has been started), there is only one additional button to the ‘BUY CARD’ button. This is the ‘PAYTABLE’ button, which is located to the bottom center of the scratch card interface below the “Match 3 symbols to win” area

Pressing the ‘PAYTABLE’ button will allow the player to see the win values for the match 3 area. Other win amounts are displayed on the relevant panels.

When the ‘in play’ interface is displayed, the ‘BUY CARD’ button becomes the ‘REVEAL ALL’ button. Pressing the ‘REVEAL ALL’ button reveals each of the 4 scratch areas in turn from left to right.

How Do You Win?

Once a game has started, the user must select each of the areas on the card by tapping/clicking with a finger or mouse over the relevant area. As the user selects, the values of the area are revealed.

Panel 1 - Located top center of the scratch card interface, is won by revealing a number 7 shirt. The player may also reveal a Trophy which will allow the player to begin the Bonus game described below.

Panel 2 - Located at the far left of the scratch card interface is won by revealing the a “Goal” ball The prize for this is randomly generated upon the player pressing “Buy card” and is shown at the top of the panel.

Panel 3 - Located bottom centre of the scratch card interface, is won by matching any 3 symbols from a set of 9 symbols in a 3x3 grid. Below the interface is a ‘PAYTABLE’ button showing the possible win values for correctly matching the corresponding symbols.

Panel 4 - Located right of the scratch card interface is won by matching any 3 values from a set of 9 values hidden behind the footballs in columns.

Bonus game - Should the player uncover a trophy in the Pick a shirt panel they will be taken to the Penalty shoot out bonus. They will be prompted to select a panel in front of a goal. Once selected the panel will reveal a cash amount, they player will win this amount plus any other amounts won on any other panels.

Extra time - Occasionally if the player has a losing card the “Extra time” panel will appear. This will cause one of two things to happen.

  • The player will then be prompted to select one of three balls. Upon selection the player will be shown the awarded prize. Prizes consist of a ball to score on the goal panel, shirt no.7, trophy or one of the missing symbols on the match 3 symbols panel.
  • A random symbol in the Match 3 area will be selected and will “spin” this will then land on a missing symbol causing a win.

In the event of a win (once the card is complete), the total win value from all 4 panels is displayed briefly in a pop-up, centrally on the scratch card interface. The total win value is also displayed in the ‘Total Paid’ field, located bottom right of the scratch card interface. Any win on each panel is also highlighted.

In the event of a loss (no win on any panel), an ‘UNLUCKY Better Luck Next Time’ pop-up is displayed briefly, centrally on the scratch interface.

Once the appropriate message has been displayed, the ‘default’ buttons return to allow the user to play again. Pressing the ‘BUY CARD’ button will reset the panels for the new game.

Payouts

Sky Bet

Panel

Win values

Championship

1

£25
 

2

£80,000, £25,000, £5,000, £1,000, £500, £200, £100, £50, £25, £10, £5

£80,000, £5,000, £500, £50, £25, £5
 

4

£80,000, £25,000, £5,000, £1,000, £500, £200, £100, £50, £25, £10, £5
  • All currencies are expressed in GBP. The amounts stated will apply in the user's own currency.

Game Recovery

  • In the event of a game in real play being interrupted (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc...), any winnings will be correctly credited to your account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.
  • If the game is started but no panels have been selected, the player will be presented with the final outcome of the card with all panels completed.
  • The sequence and values of events leading to the display of the total award, may vary from the animation prior to game recovery. This will not affect the result of the game after the game has recovered.

text.description: This Jackpot King game also contains an exciting wild respin feature!
text.gameInfo:
INTRODUCTION

Slots O'Gold is a 5-reel 10-line slot with a fun Irish theme. The game has an exciting wild respin feature as well as the Jackpot King Promotional Progressive Pot! 

CONTENTS

How To Play
Rainbow Respin
Jackpot King
Auto Play
Payout Information and Game Rules

How To Play

Instructions

  • Touch the Total Bet button to increase or decrease the amount of your TOTAL STAKE.
  • Touch one of the Bet options to select your price of play.
  • Click 'SPIN' to start your game.
  • The reels will spin and eventually stop at random.
  • If the combination of symbols appearing on the reels forms a line of 3, 4 or 5 matching symbols (starting from the left or from the right) on one of the win lines, then you win. Any winning lines you have will be highlighted and your winnings will be credited to your account balance.
  • During any spin a Leprechaun Wild in view on reels 2, 3 or 4 triggers Rainbow Respin.
  • Achieving 5 Jackpot King overlay symbols during any spin awards the Jackpot King Bonus.
  • There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically. If you wish to cancel this during your auto spins then simply press the Stop Autoplay button which will appear at the top of where the Autoplay button was previously along with the remaining number of spins.

Reel Wins

  • Line wins are multiplied by the value bet on the winning line.
  • All Wins across all different lines are added together to form the total win.
  • All line pay symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels beginning with the far left or far right reel.
  • Only the highest line win is paid on each line.
  • Scatter wins are added to any line wins.

Wild Symbol

  • The Wild symbol can be used to help form line wins by substituting for other symbols (on reels 2, 3 and 4 only).
  • The Wild symbol cannot substitute for scatter symbols or bonus symbols.
  • Only the highest paying win on each line is paid (for example 3 wild symbols being a win or those symbols being used with another symbol to make a win of 4 symbols will only pay which of those two is the highest).

Bonus Feature

Rainbow Respin

  • During any spin if a Leprechaun Wild symbol lands in view on reels 2, 3 or 4 then the Rainbow Respin is triggered. During Rainbow Respin, the Leprechaun Wild expands to cover the entire reel and remain in place while the other reels re-spin. If a new Leprechaun Wild appears during a re-spin, it expands and holds in place together with any previously expanded Leprechaun Wild for another re-spin. The Rainbow Respin Feature ends when no new Leprechaun Wilds appear during a re-spin. Up to 2 additional Leprechaun Wild symbols can appear after a Leprechaun Wild activates a re-spin, triggering 1 additional re-spin for each new Leprechaun Wild symbol that appears in view (maximum of 3 respins).

Jackpot King Deluxe Pot System

  • During any spin there is a chance that the Jackpot King Deluxe Bonus can be triggered by achieving 5 Jackpot King Deluxe overlay symbols on reels 1 to 5.
  • The Jackpot King Deluxe Pot System is available on any stake on any game plugged into the Jackpot King Deluxe System.
  • Spin the reels to accumulate Crown symbols to move up the win ladder. Achieve 15+ Crown symbols to enter the Wheel King section of the feature.
  • After any spin CHOOSE AN ICON to reveal one of the following outcomes:
  • SPIN - spins the reels again, with any additional Crown symbols in view adding to the win ladder.
  • COLLECT – ends the feature with the player being awarded a Bonus Win based on the multiplier of their Total Bet reached on the win ladder.
  • WHEEL KING - reveal this to go directly into the Wheel King round of the feature.
  • Achieving 15+ Crown Symbols during the Jackpot King Deluxe Bonus awards the Wheel King Bonus.
  • The Wheel King Feature is a Tombola style Wheel consisting of Big Win Multiplier segments and Progressive pot segments.
  • Spin the wheel to win either a Big Total Bet Multiplier or a Jackpot.
  • NOTE - The Jackpot King Deluxe Jackpots can only be won during the Wheel King part of the bonus.
  • When a jackpot is won, it is reset to the Reserve amount and begins to rise again.
  • The chances of winning a jackpot increases based on the Jackpot value (Royal and Regal pots are guaranteed to be won by the 'Must Be Won By' value).
  • Simultaneous jackpot wins cannot occur. Should two players appear to win the jackpot at the same time the first player to trigger the jackpot will win the whole jackpot amount, the second player would win the reserve pot plus any further contributions made.
  • In the event of a communication error after a promotional pot win result has been determined and before it has been displayed on screen, the win amount will automatically be transferred to the player's account.
  • While the game is live, the jackpot cannot be terminated. If the game is removed, the outstanding pool amount can be transferred to another jackpot.
  • Jackpots are funded by contributions from the player's stake except for the initial seeds for Regal and Royal jackpots which are funded by the Operator.

Progressive Jackpot

  • Progressive jackpots consists of a start-up seed which gradually increases by a percentage of funds (0.77% contributions) inputted into the game until it is won. When a jackpot is won, it is reset to the seed amount and begins to rise again.
  • The progressive Jackpot King is funded by a seed value which is 0.22% of stakes since the last jackpot was won. The Royal Jackpot has a seed value of £500, funded by the operator. The Regal Jackpot has a seed value of £5000, funded by the operator. All jackpots are topped up by contributions of 0.77% from stakes on the game and there is no ceiling value..

text.description: A classic slot with a twist. Slots O' Gold joins Megaways with exciting wild re-spin feature as well as the Jackpot King!
text.gameInfo:
INTRODUCTION

Slots O' Gold MEGAWAYS™ is a 6-reel slot featuring MEGAWAYS™. The game has an exciting wild respin feature as well as the Jackpot King Promotional Progressive Pot!

Step 1: Getting Started

  1. Press the TOTAL BET button to increase or decrease the amount of your TOTAL BET. Select from the list of available stakes from the Total Bet options (depending on Operator configuration and currency equivalent).
  2. Press 'SPIN' to start your game.
  3. There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically. If you wish to cancel this during your auto spins, press the Stop Autoplay button.

Step 2: How To Play

  • Press 'SPIN' to start the game.
  • The reels will spin and eventually stop at random.
  • If the combination of symbols appearing on the reels forms a line of 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6 matching symbols (all prizes pay left to right and right to left) on any of the MEGAWAYS™, then you win. Any winning lines you have will be highlighted and your winnings will be credited to your account balance.
  • Winnings will be credited to your account balance.

MEGAWAYS™

  • Each reel can reveal up to 5 symbols in view.
  • Each spin can have up to 15,625 ways to win.
  • A win is matching consecutive symbols, regardless of height, all prizes pay left to right and right to left.
  • All winning combinations are added together.
  • Payouts are multiplied by stake.
  • MEGAWAYS™ under licence from Big Time Gaming.

Wild Symbol

  • The Wild symbol can be used to help form line wins by substituting for other symbols (on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 only).
  • The Wild symbol cannot substitute for scatter symbols or bonus symbols.
  • Only the highest paying win on each line is paid (for example 3 wild symbols being a win or those symbols being used with another symbol to make a win of 4 symbols will only pay which of those two is the highest).

Bonus Feature

Rainbow Respin

  • During any spin if a Leprechaun Wild symbol lands in view on reels 2, 3, 4 or 5 then the Rainbow Respin is triggered. During Rainbow Respin, the Leprechaun Wild expands to cover the entire reel and remain in place while the other reels re-spin. If a new Leprechaun Wild appears during a re-spin, it expands and holds in place together with any previously expanded Leprechaun Wild for another re-spin. The Rainbow Respin Feature ends when no new Leprechaun Wilds appear during a re-spin. Up to 3 additional Leprechaun Wild symbols can appear after a Leprechaun Wild activates a re-spin, triggering 1 additional re-spin for each new Leprechaun Wild symbol that appears in view (maximum of 4 respins).

Applicable date from: 31/07/2018

  • In the event of a communication error after a promotional pot win result has been determined and before it has been displayed on screen, the win amount will automatically be transferred to the player's account.
  • While the game is live, the jackpot cannot be terminated. If the game is removed, the outstanding pool amount can be transferred to another jackpot.
  • Jackpots are funded by contributions from the player's stake except for the initial seeds for Regal and Royal jackpots which are funded by the Operator.

Progressive Jackpot

  • Progressive jackpots consists of a start-up seed which gradually increases by a percentage of funds (0.38% contributions) inputted into the game until it is won. When a jackpot is won, it is reset to the seed amount and begins to rise again.
  • The progressive Jackpot King is funded by a seed value which is 0.11% of stakes since the last jackpot was won. The Royal Jackpot has a seed value of £500, funded by the operator. The Regal Jackpot has a seed value of £5000, funded by the operator. All jackpots are topped up by contributions of 0.38% from stakes on the game and there is no ceiling value.

Jackpot prizes can occur after any spin, any bet size will be eligible for a jackpot win with the chances of winning increasing/decreasing proportionally to the bet size.
  • Jackpot prizes are awarded via bank transfer following confirmation with the games supplier and necessary identity and payment verification.

Any subesquent winners in close succession will receive the jackpot seed value plus any new jackpot contributions which may have accrued prior. If another player wins a Progressive Jackpot then a notification to this effect would occur BEFORE the current player was awarded the jackpot.

Auto Play

  • There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically.

  • Select your stake as normal then press the 'AUTOPLAY' button to select the number of 'Autoplay' bets you want to play.

text.description: Spin with Snake for some retro fun!
text.gameInfo:
This game is played on a 7 x 7 grid. There are 8 different symbols which drop in from the top of the screen. Wins are awarded for any link of 3 to 20 of any symbols, horizontally and vertically. The game also has a Free Spins round which can award high value wins using a win multiplier which increases every win.

Any winning game will result in the remaining symbols dropping down and new symbols filling in. This will then process any new wins created. 

Selecting Your Bet

Increase your total bet using the right chevron button ( > ) and decrease your total bet using the left chevron button ( < ). Use the tick ( √ ) button to confirm your stake change or the ( X ) to cancel any changes and return to the game. Press the Play button or space bar to spin.

Pay Table

All win values shown in-game are based on the bet amount.

Snake Feature

Every symbol cleared will add to the level meter. If you clear 25 or more symbols you will reach level 2, 45 or more for Level 3 and 71 or more for 12 Free Spins. Only 1 snake can be kept in reserve at any time. When no more cascades are possible the Snake Feature will be triggered.

The snake will randomly appear onto the play area and move randomly collecting the food (Symbols). Each food collected will add 1 or 2 to the snake's length. The snake can go up to 20 long. Once it has hit an edge, the symbols covered by the body of the snake length will convert to one symbol and payout.

Progressive Multiplier Free Spins

When Free Spins level of the meter has been reached 12 Free Spins are awarded. Each cascade in Free Spins will increase the multiplier by 1. This begins when Free Spins is first triggered in the base game, allowing for the multiplier to be built up before entering the feature. The multiplier starts at 3x on the following cascade. The multiplier is unlimited.

The Snake Feature can also be triggered during Free Spins by clearing 17 or more symbols, the snake can't reward the bottom two symbols during Free Spins. Clear 32 or more for an extra 12 Free Spins.

The multiplier is unlimited and will increase by 1 each winning event (cascade).

Game Rules

Win Rules

All wins are paid according to the pay table. Multiple wins in a single game are added to the total win. £250,000.00 is the maximum win available from any single game.

Game Recovery

In the event of a game not being completed due to interruption, the game will display the outcome of the interrupted game upon reconnection with the game server. All winnings allocated to the interrupted game will be credited to the player account.

Terms and Conditions

This game has a theoretical Return To Player (RTP) percentage of 94.98%.

System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.

Copyright

All original characters, renderings, screenshots and software code are Copyright ©2019 of Live5Gaming

text.gameInfo:
Game Introduction

Spartacus: Legendary Warrior showcases three thrilling Free Spin modes where extra WILD symbols are added to the reels! Land WILD symbols and watch them expand to fill the entire reel!

This game has 5 reels with 10 rows. Raise the curtains to unlock the 5 inactive rows by landing WILD symbols and triggering Free Spin modes.

AMPHITHEATRE is a scatter symbol.

WILD is wild for all symbols except for scatter symbols.

There are up to 100 win lines available in this game.

Select your bet:

To adjust the BET, use the ‘+’ and ‘-’ buttons to increase or decrease the size of your stake.

Press the SPIN button to initiate the game.

Expanded Wilds

When WILD symbols land in an unlocked section of the reel, they will transform into Expanded Wild symbols, turning the entire reel wild for all symbols except scatter symbols.

Free Spins Features

There are three Free Spin modes in this game - Recruit, Hero and Legend Free Spins.

All Free Spin modes award 12 free spins to begin the feature.

Extra WILD symbols are randomly added to the reels every spin in all Free Spin modes.

Recruit Free Spins

Land 3 AMPHITHEATRE symbols in the top 5 rows in a single spin to be awarded this feature.

Hero Free Spins

Land 3 AMPHITHEATRE symbols in the bottom 5 rows in a single spin to be awarded this feature.

In this feature, Expanded Wild symbols may award a line win multiplier of between 2x and 5x.

Legend Free Spins

Land 3 AMPHITHEATRE symbols and a WILD in a single spin to be awarded this feature.

In this feature, Expanded Wild symbols may award a line win multiplier of between 2x and 5x.

Adjacent Pays active in this feature only

Win lines

The game contains 50 win lines when only 5 rows are active, and 100 win lines when all 10 rows are active.

All line win amounts are shown in the in-game paytable. This can be viewed by pressing the ‘?’ button.

Terms and Conditions

Only active win lines can register wins.

RTP - 95.56%

Maximum Win - £250,000/€250,000

Only highest winner paid per winning combination.

Malfunction voids all plays and pays.

text.description: Ride with the Valkyrie to win your exclusive cash stack
text.gameInfo:
Choosing your bet

Use the bet ‘+’ and ‘-‘ buttons to select your bet.
Win lines are fixed at 20 lines.
Click on ‘Start’ to start the game.
To use auto spins, press ‘Autoplay’ and select your settings. To stop auto spins, press ‘Stop’ at any time.

Wilds

The wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except bonus symbols.

Colossal Magic

During the reel spin, the Valkyrie may add a colossal symbol to the reels.
It can cover any three consecutive reels.

Blade of Fury

During the reel spin, the Valkyrie may add one or more wilds to the reels.

Ice Blade

Following a spin, the Valkyrie may slide one or more symbols from reel 5 across all the other reels.
Any wins are paid.

Shockwave Slash

The Valkyrie may add symbols that match an existing win to upgrade it.
Each upgraded combination is paid as a new win.

Bonuses

Bonus Symbols Are Scatter

Wings + Wings + Free Spins
Awards 10 Free spins


Wings + Wings + Win Stack
Awards win stack


Wings + Wings + Free Spins / Win Stack
Awards 10 Free spins and win stack.Free spins play first

Win Stack

When any win is paid, the value is also added to the Win Stack.
When it is full, the oldest value drops off as the newest value is added.
When the Win Stack bonus is awarded, the total value of the previous ten wins is paid as a bonus.
When the Win Stack is awarded, this win is not added to the Win Stack.
If you leave the game and return later, the values remain.
When you first play the game, the Win Stack is empty.

Free Spins

10 free spins are awarded.
During free spins, win lines are upgraded to pay left to right or right to left.
At the end of the bonus, the total won from free spins is added to the Win Stack.

RULES

In standard play, symbols pay from left to right and must be consecutive.
In free spins, symbols pay from left to right and right to left, and must be consecutive.
All wins pay only on lines in play.
Scatter symbols may only appear on reels 1, 3 and 5
Scatter symbols in any position trigger the bonuses.
Multiple bonuses can be won in one game.

Highest win only paid on each selected line.
Highest prize only per pay direction. 5 of a kind prizes paid only once.
Highest win only paid per selected line.
Line wins are added.

The pay table always shows the prizes for the currently selected bet and number of lines.
Free spins cannot be won again during the bonus.
Free spins are played at trigger bet and lines.
Wild symbol may appear on all reels.

Bet/prize minimums and maximums are detailed in the in-game help information.
The theoretical RTP is 96.02%

All game outcomes are independent and randomly determined. The actual RTP is calculated as Total Win / Total Bet over a large number of games played and reflects the prizes awarded by a game as a percentage of all bets made. The expected RTP can vary widely in either direction for a small number of games due to statistical variance.

Malfunction voids all pays and plays.

text.description: 10 chances to scratch and match your numbers to win the top prize of £10k!
text.gameInfo:
To start the game, tap the ‘BUY CARD’ button located right of the ‘default’ scratch card interface.

Once the ‘BUY CARD’ button has been selected the panels become active and a glow appears around the stars on the top scratchable area. The scratch card interface changes to the ‘in play’ layout and the ‘BUY CARD’ button becomes the ‘REVEAL’ button ready for selection.

The stake is deducted from the current balance located bottom left of the scratch card interface.

Buttons

When the ‘default’ scratch card interface is displayed (before the game has been started) there is a flashing ‘BUY CARD’ button.

Once the game has been bought the ‘REVEAL’ button becomes active for selection. Pressing ‘REVEAL’ button will uncover each of the 2 panels rapidly in sequence left to right.

How Do You Win?

Once a game has started, the player can either chose to ‘REVEAL’ instantly all the hidden areas of the card or press each of the ‘stars’ to reveal the player's numbers.

Once the players numbers are revealed the player can select in panel 2 individual ‘Piggy Banks’ to reveal numbers to match the player’s numbers from panel 1 above this. Alternatively the player can choose to use the ‘REVEAL’ button, which uncovers all the numbers from the top and bottom panels in the card.

The player wins if there are any matching numbers within the card. The associated value overlaid on the matching number is paid to the player.

In the event of a win (once the card is complete), the total win value from the panel is displayed briefly in a pop-up centrally on the scratch card interface. The total win value is also displayed in the ‘Total Win’ field, located bottom right of the scratch card interface. 

If the players is lucky enough to reveal a ‘Golden Pig’, then if this also corresponds with getting a win from the card then that win will be multiplied by 10 times. This will be shown in the pop-up interface win panel.

In the event of a loss (no win on any panel), an ‘UNLUCKY No Wins This Time’ popup is displayed briefly centrally on the scratch card interface.

Once the appropriate message has been displayed, the ‘default’ buttons return to allow the user to play again. Pressing the ‘BUY CARD’ button will reset the panels for a new game.

Payouts

Piggy Banks - £1, £2, £5, £10, £20, £50, £100, £200, £500, £1000, £10000  

All currencies are expressed in GBP. The amounts stated will apply in the user's own currency.

Game Recovery

In the event of a game in real play being interrupted (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc...), any winnings will be correctly credited to your account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.

The sequence and values of events leading to the display of the total award may vary from the animation prior to game recovery. This will not affect the result of the game after the game has recovered.

General Information

This game has a Return to Player of 87.53%. Hit Rate 1 in 4.14

System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.

Copyright

© Copyright 2016 CORE Gaming Limited. – All rights reserved

Unauthorised copying of any images, icons, layout, or content by any means is not permitted.

text.description: Collect three Thunder Buddies Bonus icons to reach the bonus wheel
text.gameInfo:
TED BIG MONEY SCRATCHCARD is a multi-game scratchcard with an additional Wheel of Fartune feature triggered by collecting a minimum of 3 'Thunder Buddies Bonus' symbols, the wheel can grant access to 3 more exciting features including 'Bar Crawl Bonus', 'Ted's Pyramid Bonus' and 'BIG MONEY'! 

Step 1: Getting Started

  • Press the STAKE button to increase or decrease the amount of your TOTAL BET. Select from the list of available stakes from the options available (depending on Operator configuration and currency equivalent).
  • Press the QUANTITY button to cycle through available options. Choose between 1, 5 or 10.
  • The higher your QUANTITY the greater your odds of triggering the Wheel of Fartune feature.

Step 2: How To Play

  • Press 'BUY CARD/CARDS' to start the game.
  • Scratch off game 1 and if you match two of the same amount, you win that prize
  • In game 2, scratch off the panel and if you reveal a TED head, you win.
  • Scratch off game 3 and if your number beats TED's, you win.
  • 'Thunder Buddies Bonus' symbols can appear randomly on any card

Wheel of Fartune

  • Collecting 3 'Thunder Buddies Bonus' symbols over the duration of your chosen Quantity will activate the 'Wheel of Fartune'.
  • Any additional 'Thunder Buddies Bonus' symbols revealed after the wheel is active will upgrade sections of the wheel into ARROWS.
  • Once the player has revealed their final card the wheel will be presented to the player and begin to spin. Landing on an ARROW will progress the player to the next wheel tier, the result shown will be awarded to the player.
  • The player is guaranteed to be awarded either a Cash Multiplier or one of 3 Bonus Features.

Ted Modifier

  • Ted can awaken at the end of any card, when he does he can award any number of additional 'Thunder Buddies Bonus' symbols to the current card helping you progress on the Wheel of Fartune.

Bar Crawl Bonus

  • After a short screen transition the player will be presented with a secondary bonus screen that is themed around a city street.
  • The bonus shall be split into two stages; Stage 1 is a board feature where you can level up to the Big Money Bonus (stage 2).
  • The player always begins in stage 1 and is required to select bottles in order to move around the board, increasing the total bet multiplier. Landing on one of the special board positions awards one of the following positive or negative outcomes:-

Event

Action

Girls

Upgrades one or more multiplier values on the board.

Pizza House

Awards a trail run, where you can collect multipliers and Big Money counters.

Ming's Takeaway

Awards a Mystery Cash Bonus Prize

Big Money

Awards a Big Money counter. Collect 5 to enter the Big Money Bonus.

Arrested

Landing on this takes Ted to the ID parade. Make sure you're not Banged Up!

Ted's Pyramid Bonus

  • During Ted's Pyramid Bonus the player will be presented with a bonus grid, 5 rows divided in sections that become more valuable towards the top.
  • Each section contains either a Cash Multiplier or an Advance Arrow the player will always begin on the lowest row.
  • To begin a marker will sweep left-to-right until it stops and awards the corresponding prize. After each sweep the last position shall be converted into an Advance Arrow, increasing the chance of progressing further up the grid.
  • Following each turn the player will be prompted to "Pick a Ted" from 3 Ted portraits which can contain either CONTINUE or COLLECT, revealing CONTINUE will action the marker to sweep again.
  • The feature ends when COLLECT is revealed or if the player climbs to the top of the bonus grid which awards Ted Big Money Bonus.

Big Money

  • If the Big Money Bonus end game is reached, the player is presented with Ted in the centre of the screen surrounded by a carousel of multiplier values along with Sale signs down the left and right sides of the screen.
  • The values will spin and then come to a stop awarding the corresponding total bet multiplier. The player will then be prompted to pick a sale sign from either side of the carousel, revealing either RESPIN (which respins the values and adds to the bonus win) or COLLECT which ends the feature, awarding the player the overall Total Bet Multiplier achieved.

RTP

This game has a theoretical return to player of 80%. This is based on long term payback.

The maximum win from a single game is £250,000 or 10,000xBet - whichever is reached first (depending on currency. Other Operator limits may apply).

MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PLAYS AND PAYS.

Applicable date from: 15/01/2018

text.description: Join The Goonies as they embark on an adventure, pass the obstacles between you and One-Eyed Willy's treasure to be rewarded
text.gameInfo:
The Goonies is a 5-reel 20-line slot based on the cult movie of the same name! The game has 5 awesome features as well as One-Eyed Willy's Treasure Bonus where you can win up to 1000xTotal Bet!

Getting Started

Click the TOTAL BET button to increase or decrease the amount of your TOTAL BET. Select from the list of available stakes from the Total Bet options (depending on Operator configuration and currency equivalent).

Click 'SPIN' to start your game.

There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically. If you wish to cancel this during your auto spins then simply press the Stop Autoplay button.

How To Play

Press 'SPIN' to start the game.

The reels will spin and eventually stop at random.

If the combination of symbols appearing on the reels forms a line of 2, 3, 4 or 5 matching symbols (starting from the left) on one of the win lines, then you win. Any winning lines you have will be highlighted and your winnings will be credited to your account balance.

3 or more Bonus Scatter symbols anywhere on the reels awards the Bonus.

Spinning the wheel and landing on Fratelli Hideout during the Bonus awards the Fratelli Hideout Bonus.

Spinning the wheel and landing on Skeleton Organ during the Bonus awards Skeleton Organ Bonus.

Spinning the wheel and landing on Super Sloth Free Spins during the Bonus awards Super Sloth Free Spins.

Spinning the wheel and landing on Goonies Go Wild Free Spins during the Bonus awards Goonies Go Wild Free Spins.

Spinning the wheel and landing on Inferno Free Spins during the Bonus awards Inferno Free Spins.

Spinning the wheel and landing on One-Eyed Willy's Treasure during the Bonus awards One-Eyed Willy's Treasure Bonus.

Reel Wins

Line wins are multiplied by the value bet on the winning line.

All Wins across all different lines are added together to form the total win.

All line pay symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive lines beginning with the far left reel.

Only the highest line win is paid on each line.

Scatter wins are added to any line wins.

Wild Symbol

The Wild(s) symbol can be used to help form line wins by substituting for other symbols.

The Wild(s) symbol substitute for all symbols except scatter symbols or bonus symbols.Only the highest paying win on each line is paid (for example 3 wild symbols being a win or those symbols being used with another symbol to make a win of 4 symbols will only pay which of those two is the highest).

Wild symbols include: Medallion Wild, Truffle Shuffle Wild, Mikey Wild, Colossal Wild, Super Sloth Wild, Goonie Wild and Inferno Wilds.

One-Eyed Willy's Riches

One-Eyed Willy's Riches can be triggered randomly during any spin:

Truffle Shuffle Wilds - Wilds can overlay the reels, turning positions wild.

Mikey's Hidden Riches - Any of the reels can be turned into a reel stacked full of wilds.

Data's Colossal Symbols - As the reels continue to spin, 3 adjacent reels can be turned into a Colossal Reel.

Mouth's Lucky Coins - The Mystery symbol (Gold Coin) chooses a symbol at random to be displayed inside the Gold Coin. During any spin where a Coin lands on the reels a symbol is chosen which is displayed in every Coin in view.

One-Eyed Willy's Bonus Boost - Additional Bonus symbols can be added to the reels.

Sloth's Win Spin – Guaranteed to award a big winning spin.

There are also two additional modifiers which can trigger after any spin both turning a lose into a win. On a losing spin a scythe can appear which will reset the reels into a win, and also a cave collapse can occur to reveal a win.

Bonus Activation

The player enters the bonus by achieving 3 or more bonus symbols anywhere in view. There is no payout awarded directly for getting this, just entry to one of the bonus rounds.

The player will spin the wheel, which after a spin will stop on one of 6 features, revealing the bonus that has been awarded.

Fratelli Hideout Bonus

Triggered by landing on the Fratelli Hideout segment of the wheel during the Bonus.

Pick a key to reveal one of three outcomes: CASH ADD (adds a cash amount based on the player's total bet); COLLECT (ends the feature); HIDDEN TUNNEL (takes the player to the Hidden Tunnel sub-bonus).

If the Hidden Tunnel is revealed then the player can trigger any one of the 5 additional Bonuses.

Skeleton Organ Bonus

Triggered by landing on the Skeleton Organ segment of the wheel during the Bonus.

The player selects the organ keys to reveal an icon. Each character will match up to a total bet multiplier. Additionally, revealing an UPGRADE icon will upgrade the total bet multipliers or the possible feature that can be won during the bonus. Collecting 3 Key symbols unlocks the door to an additional feature bonus.

Watch out for the Skull and Crossbones. LOSE 3 LIVES AND IT'S GAME OVER!

Super Sloth Free Spins

Triggered by landing on the Super Sloth Free Spins segment of the wheel during the Bonus.

A screen transition will occur and the player will be taken to a new set of reels featuring the Fratelli family.

During any spin, if a Super Sloth Wild lands in view any Fratelli symbols on the reels are turned into the top symbol.

At the end of Free Spins the player has one extra chance to win extra prizes.

Choosing a chest reveals either Super Sloth (extra Spins), Collect (ends the feature) or One-Eyed Willy's Treasure Bonus (awards the feature).

Goonies Go Wild Free Spins

Triggered by landing on the Goonies Go Wild Free Spins segment of the wheel during the Bonus.

At the start of each spin after spin number 1, one of the top reel symbols will become Wild.

At the end of Free Spins the player has one extra chance to win extra prizes.

Picking one of the Copperpot Doubloons will reveal either COLLECT (ends feature), EXTRA SPINS or One-Eyed Willy's Treasure (awards that feature). If the player reveals EXTRA SPINS then they are awarded up to 5 extra spins with all of the Goonies symbols wild.

Inferno Free Spins

Triggered by landing on the Inferno Free Spins segment of the wheel during the Bonus.

At the start of each spin the Inferno will move across the reels from right to left, turning between 1 and 3 consecutive reels Wild.

At the end of Free Spins the player has one extra chance to win extra prizes.

Spinning the wheel will reveal either COLLECT (ends feature), EXTRA SPINS or One-Eyed Willy's Treasure (awards that feature). If the player reveals EXTRA SPINS then the feature is retriggered.

One-Eyed Willy's Treasure Bonus

Collecting 5 Bonus symbols, gambling to, or having landed on the One-Eyed Willy's Treasure Bonus on the Bonus Wheel triggers the One-Eyed Willy's Treasure Bonus.

The values will spin and then come to a stop awarding the corresponding total bet multiplier. The feature continues until the booby trap is triggered on the scales, where the player is awarded their total bet multiplier win.

Feature Gamble

Whenever a Feature win is achieved in the game (except for One-Eyed Willy's Treasure Bonus), the player has the option to either COLLECT the feature or Gamble to try and win one of the other features in the game.

After the award of the initial Bonus from the wheel spin during the Bonus, the player will be presented with a Gamble screen showing the 6 features from bottom to top, ranked in terms of average payout. The feature the player has won will be shown to the player with the words COLLECT and GAMBLE shown on the feature panel in the centre of the screen.

If the player gambles and wins, the feature they have gambled to can be collected, with all features below that now eliminated. This continues until the player collects, reaches the top feature (where it awards that feature) or the player lands on the Mystery Win segment during the wheel spin where they are then awarded a Mystery Win Prize (a mystery cash value based on a multiplier of the player's total bet).

The odds of winning during the gamble feature are not necessarily the odds shown.

Auto Play

There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically.

By selecting 'AUTOPLAY' you can choose to place up to 100 bets automatically, one after the other.

Select your stake as normal then press the 'AUTOPLAY' button to select the number of 'Autoplay' bets you want to play.

Select your Loss Limit (maximum amount willing to lose for the autoplay session) and then press PLAY to begin your autoplays (other options are available).

Auto Play will turn off if you get into any bonus round including Freespins, if you reach the set Loss Limit or if a Progressive pot is awarded (where applicable).

You can stop Auto Play from continuing onto the next spin by clicking the 'STOP' button

Payout Information and Game Rules

Line wins are multiplied by the value bet on the winning line.

Wins on different paylines are added.

All line pay symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels beginning with the far left reel (20 lines always active). Only the highest line win is paid on each line.

Feature symbols are scatter wins and are awarded when appearing on any position on the reels for any number of played lines.

Multiple scatter features can be won in a single game.

Scatter wins are paid in addition to reel wins.

RTP - 96%.

Free Spins are played on the same number of lines and bet per line/Total Bet as the triggering game (20 lines always active).

MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PLAYS AND PAYS.

The maximum win from a single game is £250,000 or 10,000xBet

text.description: Will you land the Jackpot King in this mystical wizardry slot?
text.gameInfo:
INTRODUCTION

The Pig Wizard is a 5-reel 20-line slot with a mystical fantasy theme. The game has 2 exciting, interactive features as well as a Free Spins Bonus with WILDs and Magic Mirrors as well as the Jackpot King Promotional Progressive Jackpot. Look out for The Pig Wizard appearing during any spin where he can change the symbols to create a win or award the Bonus...Winnus Revealo!!! 

How To Play

Instructions

  • Touch the Total Bet button to increase or decrease the amount of your TOTAL STAKE.
  • Touch the button and scroll through the Bet options to select your price of play.
  • Bet from 20p up to £500 (depending on Operator configuration and currency equivalent) by touching the value of the Total Bet you wish to play.
  • Click 'SPIN' to start your game.
  • The reels will spin and eventually stop at random.
  • If the combination of symbols appearing on the reels forms a line of 2, 3, 4 or 5 matching symbols (starting from the left) on one of the win lines, then you win. Any winning lines you have will be highlighted and your winnings will be credited to your account balance.
  • There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically. If you wish to cancel this during your auto spins then simply press the Stop Autoplay button which will appear at the top of where the Autoplay button was previously along with the remaining number of spins.

Reel Wins

  • Line wins are multiplied by the value bet on the winning line.
  • All wins across all different lines are added together to form the total win.
  • All line pay symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive lines beginning with the far left reel.
  • Only the highest line win is paid on each line.
  • Scatter wins are added to any line wins.

Wild Symbol

  • The Wild symbol (Wild) can be used to help form line wins by substituting for other symbols.
  • The Wild symbol cannot substitute for scatter symbols or bonus symbols.
  • Only the highest paying win on each line is paid (for example 3 wild symbols being a win or those symbols being used with another symbol to make a win of 4 symbols will only pay which of those two is the highest).

Bonus Features

Magical Map Bonus

  • 3 Bonus Scatter symbols anywhere on reels 1, 3 and 5 awards the Mystical Map Bonus.
  • Revealing Free Spins awards the Magic Mirror Free Spins Bonus.
  • Revealing Trail of Magic awards the Trail of Magic Bonus.
  • Revealing Squeal or no Squeal awards the Squeal or no Squeal Bonus.
  • Revealing Bonus Cash Prize awards a Bonus Mystery Win.

Trail of Magic Bonus

  • Revealing Trail of Magic during the Mystical Map Bonus will start the Trail of Magic bonus.
  • Roll the dice to move around the board collecting multipliers, potions and crystal balls.
  • There are three potions on the trail, each with a different effect.
  • GHOST creates a mystical version of the Pig Wizard which moves around the board as you do, collecting multipliers and potions.
  • MYSTERY ADD can increase your current win as well as upping the values displayed on the board.
  • Land on a crystal ball to see the future which reveals a mystery outcome!
  • Continue moving around the board to try and win magical prizes.
  • If the poison bottle is filled then the Pig Wizard is turned into a Frog and the feature ends, where you are awarded the value displayed in the Winnings panel.

Squeal Or No Squeal Bonus

  • Revealing Squeal or no Squeal during the Mystical Map Bonus will start the Squeal or no Squeal bonus.
  • Select a Book to reveal a cash prize.
  • Press SQUEAL to collect that prize or NO SQUEAL to pick again.
  • The feature continues until the player collects a prize or has selected 5 books.

Bonus Cash Prize

  • Revealing Bonus Cash Prize during the Mystical Map Bonus will award the player a mystery cash prize, which is a multiplier of their Total Bet.

Jackpot King Deluxe Pot System

  • During any spin there is a chance that the Jackpot King Deluxe Bonus can be triggered by achieving 5 Jackpot King Deluxe overlay symbols on reels 1 to 5.
  • The Jackpot King Deluxe Pot System is available on any stake on any game plugged into the Jackpot King Deluxe System.
  • Spin the reels to accumulate Crown symbols to move up the win ladder. Achieve 15+ Crown symbols to enter the Wheel King section of the feature.
  • After any spin CHOOSE AN ICON to reveal one of the following outcomes:
  • SPIN - spins the reels again, with any additional Crown symbols in view adding to the win ladder.
  • COLLECT – ends the feature with the player being awarded a Bonus Win based on the multiplier of their Total Bet reached on the win ladder.
  • WHEEL KING - reveal this to go directly into the Wheel King round of the feature.
  • Achieving 15+ Crown Symbols during the Jackpot King Deluxe Bonus awards the Wheel King Bonus.
  • The Wheel King Feature is a Tombola style Wheel consisting of Big Win Multiplier segments and Progressive pot segments.
  • Spin the wheel to win either a Big Total Bet Multiplier or a Jackpot.
  • NOTE - The Jackpot King Deluxe Jackpots can only be won during the Wheel King part of the bonus.
  • When a jackpot is won, it is reset to the Reserve amount and begins to rise again.
  • The chances of winning a jackpot increases based on the Jackpot value (Royal and Regal pots are guaranteed to be won by the 'Must Be Won By' value).
  • Simultaneous jackpot wins cannot occur. Should two players appear to win the jackpot at the same time the first player to trigger the jackpot will win the whole jackpot amount, the second player would win the reserve pot plus any further contributions made.
  • In the event of a communication error after a promotional pot win result has been determined and before it has been displayed on screen, the win amount will automatically be transferred to the player's account.
  • While the game is live, the jackpot cannot be terminated. If the game is removed, the outstanding pool amount can be transferred to another jackpot.
  • Jackpots are funded by contributions from the player's stake except for the initial seeds for Regal and Royal jackpots which are funded by the Operator.

Progressive Jackpot

  • Progressive jackpots consists of a start-up seed which gradually increases by a percentage of funds (0.38% contributions) inputted into the game until it is won. When a jackpot is won, it is reset to the seed amount and begins to rise again.
  • The progressive Jackpot King is funded by a seed value which is 0.11% of stakes since the last jackpot was won. The Royal Jackpot has a seed value of £500, funded by the operator. The Regal Jackpot has a seed value of £5000, funded by the operator. All jackpots are topped up by contributions of 0.38% from stakes on the game and there is no ceiling value.
  • Total return to [player from the progressive jackpot is 0.5%
  • The progressive jackpot is available in "real play" only. There are no eligibility requirements for the progressive jackpot, all players are eligible to win.
  • The progressive jackpot is determined by Landing on a Jackpot Segment during the Wheel King Bonus in the Jackpot King Bonus Feature, more details on this can be found in the How to Play section above. Jackpot prizes can occur after any spin, any bet size will be eligible for a jackpot win with the chances of winning increasing/decreasing proportionally to the bet size.
  • Jackpot prizes are awarded via bank transfer following confirmation with the games supplier and necessary identity and payment verification.
  • In the unlikely event of concurrent progressive winners, the system will determine the first winner, who will receive the full jackpot value. Any subesquent winners in close succession will receive the jackpot seed value plus any new jackpot contributions which may have accrued prior. If another player wins a Progressive Jackpot then a notification to this effect would occur BEFORE the current player was awarded the jackpot.

Auto Play

  • There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically.
  • By selecting 'AUTOPLAY' you can choose to place up to 100 bets automatically, one after the other.
  • Select your stake as normal then press the 'AUTOPLAY' button to select the number of 'Autoplay' bets you want to play.
    • (The following additional functions are also applicable depending on jurisdiction)
  • Select your Loss Limit (maximum amount willing to lose for the autoplay session) and then press PLAY to begin your autoplays (other options are available).
  • Auto Play will turn off if you get into any bonus round including Freespins, if you reach the set Loss Limit or if a Progressive pot is awarded (where applicable).
  • You can stop Auto Play from continuing onto the next spin by clicking the 'STOP' button

Payout Information and Game Rules

  • Line wins are multiplied by the value bet on the winning line.
  • Wins on different paylines are added.
  • All line pay symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels beginning with the far left reel (20 lines always active). Only the highest line win is paid on each line.
  • Feature symbols are scatter wins and are awarded when appearing on any position on the reels for any number of played lines (20 lines always active).
  • Multiple scatter features can be won in a single game.
  • Scatter wins are paid in addition to reel wins.
  • Free Spins are played on the same number of lines and bet per line/Total Bet as the triggering game (20 lines always active).
  • MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PLAYS AND PAYS.

The maximum win from a single game is £250,000 or 10,000xBet - whichever is reached first (depending on currency. Other Operator limits may apply).

This game has a theoretical return to player from 90.663%-93.743% + promotional jackpots

Applicable date from: 12/09/2017

text.gameInfo:
INTRODUCTION

Vikings Unleashed is a 6-reel slot featuring MEGAWAYS™. Strike fame and fortune in this Nordic adventure extravaganza with up to 117,649 ways to win, cascading symbols and an Unlimited Win Multiplier during Free Spins, which increases after every win. Watch out for the hammer Symbol, all in view will reveal the same random symbol for even more ways to find your fortune!

Step 1: Getting Started

  1. Press the TOTAL BET button to increase or decrease the amount of your TOTAL BET. Select from the list of available stakes from the Total Bet options (depending on Operator configuration and currency equivalent).
  2. Press 'SPIN' to start your game.
  3. There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically. If you wish to cancel this during your auto spins, press the Stop Autoplay button.

Step 2: How To Play

  • Press 'SPIN' to start the game.
  • The reels will spin and eventually stop at random.
  • If the combination of symbols appearing on the reels forms a line of 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6 matching symbols (starting from the leftmost reel) on any of the MEGAWAYS™, then you win. Any winnings you have will be highlighted causing an explosion and more symbols will cascade in.
  • Winnings will be credited to your account balance.

Cascading Symbols

  • All winning symbols will cause a chain reaction.
  • The winning symbols will be removed from the reels and replaced by new symbols coming from above the reels.
  • There are symbol positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5. They help form wins and are the only positions that can reveal Wild Symbols. These will be replaced from the right.
  • Cascades will continue until no more winning symbols are generated.

MEGAWAYS™

  • Each reel can reveal up to 7 symbols in view.
  • Each spin can have up to 117,649 ways to win.
  • A win is matching consecutive symbols, regardless of height, from left to right starting from the left most reel.
  • All winning combinations are added together.
  • Payouts are multiplied by stake.
  • MEGAWAYS™ under licence from Big Time Gaming.

Wild Symbol

  • The Wild Symbol can only appear in the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5.
  • The Wild Symbol can be used to help form wins by substituting for other symbols excluding scatter symbols.
  • Only the highest win is paid per winning combination.

Hammer Symbol

  • The Hammer Symbol can appear in any position.
  • All Hammer Symbols in view will reveal the same random symbol.
  • The Hammer Symbol cannot reveal scatter symbols.

Scatter

  • The Scatter Symbol can appear in any of the reels but not in the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5.
  • 4 Scatter Symbols in view awards 12 Free Spins. Every additional Scatter Symbol adds an extra 5 Free Spins.
  • Scatter wins are awarded in addition to reel wins.

Free Spins

  • During Free Spins there is an Unlimited Win Multiplier active which starts at 1 and is increased by 1 after every Cascade.
  • During Free Spins the positions above reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 can reveal Free Spins Scatters and will award extra Free Spins.
  • 3 Free Spins Scatters = 5 extra Free Spins.
  • 4 Free Spins Scatters = 10 extra Free Spins.
  • The stake that was used to trigger the Free Spins will be used for the Free Spins duration.
  • At the end of Free Spins, the total winnings for the spins will be displayed. Any winnings will be credited to the players account and regular play then resumes.

Gamble

  • Before the Free Spins starts the player can choose to Gamble the number of spins they start with and/or the starting multiplier.
  • 'Press to Gamble' on either pie to spin the corresponding wheel.
  • A winning outcome of the pie will update both gamble pies for the next gamble.
  • Any losing gamble will return the player back to the base game.
  • The gamble will be capped at 27 spins and a x10 multiplier.

Free Spins Unleashed Big Bet (depending on Operator configuration)

  • Press the Free Spins Unleashed button to see big bet options.
  • Choose from one of four available big bet options of 25x, 50x, 75x and 100x bet.
  • Upon selecting, the player will be taken straight into the Gamble screen (the same as if the Bonus was triggered naturally).

Auto Play

  • There is an Autoplay function in the game that will start each spin automatically.
  • By selecting 'AUTOPLAY' you can choose to place up to 100 bets automatically, one after the other.
  • Select your stake as normal then press the 'AUTOPLAY' button to select the number of 'Autoplay' bets you want to play.
  • Select your Loss Limit (maximum amount willing to lose for the autoplay session) and then press PLAY to begin your autoplays (other options are available).
  • Auto Play will turn off if you get into any bonus round including Free Spins, if you reach the set Loss Limit or if a Progressive pot is awarded (where applicable).
  • You can stop Auto Play from continuing onto the next spin by clicking the 'STOP' button.

Payout Information and Game Rules

  • The maximum win from a single game is £250,000 or 50,000xBet - whichever is reached first (or currency equivalent. Other Operator limits may apply).
  • MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PLAYS AND PAYS.

RTP: 96.5%

Applicable date from: 14/11/2018

GameData.name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire

text.gameInfo:
Millionaire is a six-reel video slot with reacting wins featuring Big Time Gaming’s unique Megaways™

Select your stake by clicking the left and right arrow buttons on the stake. The stake value is displayed in the stake display.

Start the Spin

Press the Play button to start the spin at the stake displayed. The 6 reels will spin and then come to stop, displaying the result.

Auto play

To set up Auto play press the Auto button. This will display Auto play panel which the player can use to modify the number of spins, set a loss limit or set a win limit. When a loss limit has been set the player can select Start to commence auto play.

When Auto play is on, the Play button will change to a Stop button. The remaining Auto plays will be displayed in the Stop button. The player can cancel Auto play by clicking the Stop button. Auto play will stop automatically if any of the limits set is reached or anything occurs that requires player intervention.

Extra Reel

The extra reel adds a symbol to the reel it is below for reels 2, 3, 4 and 5.

Reactions

Every winning symbol is part of a reaction and is replaced by symbols coming from above on the reels and from the right in the extra reel.

Symbol Wins

A win is matching consecutive symbols, regardless of height, from left to right starting from left most reel.

Highest win paid per winning combination. All winning combinations are added together. See PAYS for further information.

Wild

Wilds substitute every symbol except Scatter. 

Wilds are only present in the extra reel.

Scatter

The Millionaire Scatter icon can appear in any of the six vertical reels.

Get three Scatters to win eight Free Spins and start the Hot Seat Free Spins Gamble.

Each additional Scatter moves you up a rung in the Hot Seat Free Spins Gamble prize ladder.

Hot Seat Free Spins Gamble

The Hot Seat Free Spins Gamble gives you the chance to win up to 50 Free Spins.

The gamble prize ladder has 12 rungs. The rung values are 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 22, 25, 30, 40, and 50 Free Spins.

The starting rung is determined by the number of Scatters that triggered the feature. Rung 1 for 3 Scatters, Rung 2 for 4 Scatters, and so on.

Rung 2 and Rung 7 are safety net rungs. Reaching these rungs guarantee at least 10 and 20 Free Spins respectively.

Walk Away / Final Answer

To start Free Spins without gambling press WALK AWAY.

To gamble select an answer from A, B, C or D and press FINAL ANSWER.

A successful gamble moves you up a rung up the prize ladder.

An unsuccessful gamble exits the feature with 0, 10 or 20 Free Spins depending on the ladder rung reached.

WALK AWAY is disabled at rung 2 and rung 7 because these are risk free gambles.

Lifelines

A Lifeline is given at each gamble. The Lifelines are 50:50, Phone a Friend, and Ask the Audience.

50:50 removes two incorrect answers.

Phone a Friend reveals the most likely answer and its chance of being correct.

Ask the Audience reveals the chance of being correct for each answer.

Free Spins

During Free Spins there is an unlimited win multiplier which starts at 1 and is increased by 1 after each reaction.

Free Spin Scatter icons can appear in the extra reel and will award extra Free Spins. The stake that was used to trigger the Free Spins will be used for the Free Spins duration.

At the end of the Free Spins, the total winnings for the spins will be displayed. Any winnings will be credited into the players account and regular play then resumes.

The Free Spin Scatter icon can appear in the extra reel during Free Spins.

3 Scatters = 4 extra Free Spins. 4 Scatters = 8 extra Free Spins.

General Information

The game has an RTP of 96.27%

Maximum Win - £250,000/€250,000

The optimal strategy is to choose the answer indicated by the Phone a Friend Lifeline and to choose an answer with the highest percentage in the Ask the Audience Lifeline.

System malfunction voids all pays and plays.

November 15, 2018

text.description: A reel adventure with 36 free spins & win spins bonus rounds!
text.gameInfo:
Wilbur’s Wild Wonderland is a 3x5 slot with 20 winlines that features 36 Free Spins and Win Spins bonus rounds and 4 base game modifiers.

Each press of PLAY will action each reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching some 2 of-a-kind and all 3, 4 or 5 of-a-kind symbols.

All wins are paid left to right.

All wins shown on different winlines will be shown and paid to the player.

The Wild symbol can substitute for ALL other symbols, (except the Bonus symbol), to help create a line win. Using a Wild symbol to complete a line does not incur any extra multiplier other than the win for the symbol(s) it substitutes. Only the highest paying win on each line will be counted.

3 or more Bonus trigger symbols will trigger the feature and can appear on any of the reels. There is an associated payout for 3+. Once the feature has been triggered the game will do a transition into a map of the theme park.

The player is prompted to select any of the rides populated on the theme park map. The player picks rides until they are forced to stop selecting by way of the park being ‘closed’. On each selection, the player will be given various components which will accumulate to build a bonus round.

Set Your Stake

The player can choose their stake by pressing the + and - buttons on the left of the screen. The stake will be shown in the Total Stake meter.

Features

Modifiers: ‘Ticket to Ride’ - During the main game, on random occasions, a modifier can alter the spin event. During any spin, the player may be presented with the theme park owner, Wilbur, who will ask you to pick from a choice of 4 mystery tickets for a ride. Once you have chosen one of them, the ticket is flipped to reveal a ride logo. The tickets not chosen are also revealed to the player, deselected, and the reels come to a halt. The 4 modifiers are:

'The Ferris Wheel modifier: Once the single spin of the reels come to a halt, you will be presented with overlaid Wilds in a predetermined pattern. The Wilds will move 5 times in a pattern which will process any wins which may occur as the Wilds move as overlays over the current reel stop. The ‘Ferris Wheel’ is a series of 3 Wilds stacked on the middle reel which then pivot in a clockwise direction. The Wilds move in a straight line rotating like a wheel with the middle wild on the middle reel being the axis. On the 5th rotation the Wilds return to vertical stacked Wilds on the middle reel.

'The Caterpillar modifier: Once the single spin of the reels come to a halt, you will be presented with overlaid Wilds in a predetermined pattern. The Wilds will move 5 times in a pattern which will process any wins which may occur as the Wilds move as overlays over the current reel stop. The ‘Caterpillar’ is a series of 3 Wilds joined together which then move in an anti-clockwise direction around the very outer symbols on the reels presentation.

'The Tea Cups modifier: Once the single spin of the reels come to a halt, you will be presented with overlaid Wilds in a predetermined pattern. The Wilds will move 5 times in a pattern which will process any wins which may occur as the Wilds move as overlays over the current reel stop. The ‘Tea Cups’ is a series of 4 Wilds which move in a rotating pattern. On the 5th rotation the Wilds return to their original position.

'The Carousel modifier: Once the single spin of the reels come to a halt, you will be presented with overlaid Wilds in a predetermined pattern. The Wilds will move 5 times in a pattern which will process any wins which may occur as the Wilds move as overlays over the current reel stop. The ‘Carousel’ is a series of 3 Wilds arranged in a triangular shape around the middle reel which then pivot in a clockwise direction. The Wilds move in a rotating fashion around the middle symbol on the middle reel. On the 5th rotation the Wilds return to their original layout.

During main game play, there will be, at random, scatter bonus symbols landing in the reel frames 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5. Once the bonus event has been triggered you will be presented with a transition to an interactive theme park map. Scatter Bonus symbols are not present during free spins nor win spins.

Once the map is activated, you are is prompted to select any of the rides populated on the map. You have up to 10 picks until you find a ‘Park closed’ and are forced to stop selecting. Each successful selection will give you various components which will accumulate to build a bonus free spins or win spins round.

'Standard Win Spins: These will be spins on the reels where the outcome is always a winning combination. There are up to 8 potential combinations of spin amounts varying from 5 to 50 Win Spins.

'Win Spins without 'symbols': These will be spins on the reels where the outcome is always a winning combination with 3 or more of the lower paying symbols removed (10, J, Q, K, A, and Hotdog). These improve the wins as other higher paying symbols will replace those removed on the reels in the winning combinations.

'Unlimited Win Spins with 'Lives': These will be spins on the reels where the outcome is always a winning combination. The amount of spins is not restricted, however, at random, a 'Heart' symbol will land anywhere on reel 5 and stop the spins. However, if the player has lives left, the heart symbol will be ignored and a life will be taken away from the lives meter.

'Win Spins with 'Multipliers': These will be spins on the reels where the outcome is always a winning combination. However, during the 5 to 10 spins, each spin will have a multiplier applied which will improve the win between 2x and 5x of the winning combination.

'Free Spins with 'Additional Wilds': These will be between 5 to 100 Free Spins on the reels, which may spin to a winning or a losing combination. However, during the spins, extra Wild symbols may land on the reels. The addition of extra Wilds increase the chance of a better win as more Wilds are added.

'Free Spins with 'Multipliers': These are Free Spins on the reels, which may spin to a winning or a losing combination. There;are up to 5 of these spin types varying from 5 to 100 Free Spins and range from 2x to 5x multipliers.

'Free Spins with 'Wild Reels': These will be between 5 to 10 Free Spins on the reels, which may spin to a winning or a losing combination. However, during the spins, 1 to 4 reels can become Wild. The addition of extra Wilds increase the chance of a better win.

'Free Spins with 'Extra Winlines': These are Free Spins on the base game which may spin to a winning or a losing combination. There are up to 3 of these spin types, each with 10 Free Spins, the extra winlines varying from 5 to 20. These extra winlines can take the base game from 20 up to 40 winlines. The more winlines that are activated the greater the chance of winning combinations on the reels.

Buttons

Pressing the rotating arrow icon above the play button will open a dialogue panel from which the player can access the autoplays adjuster. If autoplays are not approved in the jurisdiction, this button will not be available.

Pressing the ‘menu’ icon, on the right-hand side above the rotating arrow icon , will open the Paytable information. The player can press the arrows left and right to access all the game information. Pressing the ‘X’ button will return the player to the main game interface.

Accessing the Paytable will allow the player to toggle the sounds on/off. On a device that is compatible, the player can also turn on/off the vibrate function. On launch of the game, the default setting will be ON for both of these options.

Plus and minus buttons on ‘Total Stake’ adjust the player's total stake on each spin.

Paytable

Only the highest win per bet line is paid.

Line wins will pay from left to right only.

Adjustment of the stake will dynamically alter the awards in the paytable.

Game Recovery

In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc.), depending on the previous state of the game, it will either resume from the point of the last spin or display the outcome of the game already in play. The current multiplier on that stake will also be displayed.

Any winnings will be correctly credited to the player account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.

General Information

This game has a theoretical Return to Player (RTP) of 95.00%.

The maximum payout of one spin in this game is 250,000.00.

System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.

All in game outcomes are predetermined.

Due to high production values of this game, lower-tier hardware may run into compatibility issues and, in certain instances, you will not be able to play.

Copyright

© 2017 CORE Gaming Limited. All rights reserved.

Unauthorised copying of any images or content by any means is not permitted.
