text.gameInfo:
Wild Fury offers reels loaded with Wild symbols and the chance to win one of five jackpots. The popular Stacked Wilds feature offers more chances to collect Wild symbols and increase the jackpot values! Unleash the fiery dragons when eight or more Wilds appear on a single spin. Trigger the Free Spins Bonus and spin the wheel for a chance to win up to 20 free spins. Watch for Level Up symbols during the bonus to increase the jackpot values even more. With a guaranteed jackpot win in every bonus.

How To Bet

Wild Fury Jackpots features 10 paylines.

Bet Configuration Menu

Press the arrow to open the bet configuration menu.

Press the check mark to confirm and close the bet configuration menu.

Lines

Displays the current number of paylines.

Betting is fixed at 10 paylines.

Total Bet

Displays the current total bet shown in currency.

Press the minus button (–) to decrease the total bet.

Press the plus button (+) to increase the total bet.

Spin

Press the circular arrow to submit the bet and spin the reels.

Stacked Wilds Feature

With the Stacked Wilds feature, each reel is loaded with groups of four or more consecutive Wild symbols. In the Free Spins Bonus, the Stacked Wilds feature is even richer and more plentiful.

Free Spins Bonus

The Free Spins Bonus is triggered when three Bonus scatter symbols appear anywhere on the centre reels. These symbols are found on reels 2, 3, and 4 only.

A single wheel spin occurs before the Free Spins Bonus to determine the number of initial free spins awarded. After the wheel stops, 10, 15, or 20 free spins are awarded as indicated by the wheel pointer.

The reels in the Free Spins Bonus have a richer, more plentiful Stacked Wilds feature than the base game reels.

Each Plus 1 Spin symbol in any position on the reels awards 1 extra free spin, up to a maximum of 100 free spins per bonus.

Reels used in the Free Spins Bonus are different from the reels used in the base game.

Free spins are played at same line bet and same number of paylines as the triggering spin.

Jackpot Bonus

Wild symbols that appear on the reels during the Free Spins Bonus are collected to win Jackpot awards.

At the end of the bonus, the total number of Wild symbols is compared to the Jackpot thresholds and the highest single eligible Jackpot is awarded.

The number of Wild symbols collected always start at zero on each Free Spins Bonus trigger.

Number of Wild Symbols

Jackpot Starting Value

100 or more

2000

65 to 99

500

40 to 64

200

20 to 39

125

less than 20

80

Each Level Up symbol in any position on reel 3 increases each Jackpot by its starting value.

Each Double Level Up symbol in any position on reel 3 increases each Jackpot by 2 times its starting value.

Jackpots may be increased up to a maximum of 10 times.

After all awarded free spins have been played, the Jackpot value is awarded corresponding to the highest number of Wild symbols collected.

Jackpot values are multiplied by the line bet.

Rules

Misuse or malfunction voids all pays and plays.

All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning with the far-left reel.

Only the highest winner is paid on each payline. Line wins are multiplied by the line bet on the winning line. Coinciding line wins on different paylines are added.

Only the highest scatter win is paid per scatter symbol. Scatter wins are multiplied by the total bet.

Scatter wins are independent from line wins and are added to the total amount paid.

Bonus wins are independent from line wins and are added to the total amount paid.

Wild symbol appears on all reels in the base game and the Free Spins Bonus.

Wins are shown in currency.

In some jurisdictions, regardless of bet size, there is an award cap on any single transaction. See the paytable for details. A transaction includes the results of the bonus, plus the outcome which launched the bonus. If the award cap is reached in the bonus, the bonus ends immediately, even if there are remaining free spins.

Expected Payback

In accordance with fair gaming practices required in most legal jurisdictions worldwide, each and every game outcome is completely independent, except in cases where one spin unlocks a feature for a subsequent spin or series of spins, per the game rules. The odds of getting any particular outcome are always the same.

The odds do not vary based on prior outcomes, bet size, balance size, time of day, day of week, etc. For example, if the top award is won on a given play of the game, the chances of winning the top award on the next play are exactly the same. Likewise, prior losses do not change future odds.

The expected payback reflects the theoretical return across a very large number of plays by numerous players over an extended period of time. The results for any given player over a play session can vary widely from this long-term, expected average in either direction. The fewer the number of games played, the wider the normal variance of actual payback that may be experienced.

The theoretical average return to player (RTP) is 94.81%. This RTP represents the long-term expected payback of the game which has been calculated by an independent testing company.

Malfunction Voids all Pays & Plays.

Intellectual Property

© 2018 IGT. All rights reserved. All other trademarks used herein are owned by IGT or its affiliates, may not be used without permission, and where indicated with a ®, are registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.

text.gameInfo:
Wild Rain is a 20 winline 5X3 reel slot, Orientally themed around the weather and stormy rain. In the base game, the game features ‘Raining Wilds’ which drop down from the top of the reels and are persistent on each spin until they move down off the reels. There are 6 modifiers and a ‘Raining Wild’ Free Spins round.

  • Set your stake: On the left of the screen, the player can choose their stake by pressing the + and - buttons. The stake will be shown in the Total Stake meter.
  • Each press of PLAY will action each reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching 3, 4 or 5 of-a-kind symbols and also 2 of-a-kind Wild and Logo symbols on winlines. 
  • Line wins pay left to right. All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning from the far left.
  • All wins shown on different winlines will be shown and paid to the player.
  • The Wild symbol and ‘Raining Wilds’ symbols can substitute for ALL other symbols, EXCEPT scatter symbols, to help create a line win. Using a Wild symbol to complete a line does not incur any extra multiplier other than the win for the symbol(s) it substitutes. Only the highest paying win on each line will be counted.
  • There are ‘Raining Wilds’ symbols that can appear on any of the 1 to 5 reels. This unique gameplay is persistent from game to game. When the player presses ‘PLAY’, the reels spin as they normally do in a traditional slot. However, occasionally, sets of overlaid ‘Raining Wilds’ start to drop down from any of the 5 reel positions above the reels. Once the ‘Raining Wilds’ has started, these ‘Raining Wild’ symbols remain on their own reels and move one position down per spin.
  • As they move down the aperture, the player will see these Wilds for 3 spins. More ‘Raining Wilds’ can appear in the reels and there will be periods of play when NO ‘Raining Wilds’ are present.
  • Bonus Scatter Symbols: These symbols can appear on any reel. 3 or more Bonus scatter symbols landing on any of the reels will trigger the Bonus feature and award Free Spins as follows:
  • 3 Bonus scatter symbols in view trigger 10 Free Spins

 

An extra 5 Free Spins will be awarded for each additional Bonus symbol in view.

 Base Game Modifiers

During the base game, on any spin there will be a chance that the stormclouds gather and a lightning or wind modifier will strike the reels, awarding one of the following modifications:

 

  • Lightning Times: Player presses PLAY, the reels keep spinning, the storm clouds gather and lightning strikes the reels and a multiplier is shown to the player. If there are any wins once the reels come to a halt, these are multiplied by the value that was shown. This does not guarantee a win.
  • Wild Lightning: Player presses PLAY, the reels keep spinning and lightning strikes multiple symbol positions on the reels which are then populated with ‘Raining Wild’ symbols. The reels then come to a halt. This does not guarantee a win. These ‘Raining Wild’ symbols remain in position for subsequent spins, moving down 1 position on each subsequent spin until they are removed from the reels.
  • Bonus Chance: Occasionally, a Bonus Free Spins trigger symbol will drop down into view. This overlaid Bonus trigger symbol will remain on its own reel and move down one position per spin. The player will see the overlaid trigger symbol moving down the reels for the next 3 spins. There maybe more Bonus trigger symbols that appear on the reels.
  • Hurricane Wild: At random, the ‘wind’ could pick up after a player presses PLAY and shifts the current ‘Raining Wild’ symbols in view from right to left, lining them up on the left hand side. The reels will then land naturally at random. Subsequent spins move these 'Raining Wild' symbols down by 1 position on the reels until these move off the reels.
  • Tornado Wild: At random, after the player presses PLAY, a ‘tornado’ could pick up and lift the current ‘Raining Wild’ symbols upwards and into view. The ‘Raining Wilds’ will move upwards towards the top of the reel window as far as they can go. The reels will then land naturally at random. Subsequent spins move these 'Raining Wild' symbols down by 1 position on the reels until these move off the reels.
  • Lightning Bonus: In the base game, if the player gets 2 Bonus symbols anywhere in view the lightning could turn any random symbol into the third Bonus symbol needed to trigger ‘Raining Wild’ Free Spins.

 Raining Wild Free Spins

On triggering the feature, the player will be awarded a number of Free Spins. The Free Spins mechanic is an enhanced version of the base game in that, if any ‘Raining Wilds’ appear, they will persist and move down one position each spin but will be far more frequent and will have a greater chance of awarding additional Wilds.

  • Any normal Wilds that spin in naturally contribute to any payline but will NOT become ‘Raining Wild’ and will spin off on the next spin.
  • During the ‘Raining Wild’ Free Spins, the scatter Bonus symbols will still be present on the reels. If 2 or more Bonus scatter symbols land anywhere in view, then further Free Spins are triggered as follows:
  • 2 Bonus scatter symbols trigger 5 Free Spins
  • 3 Bonus scatter symbols trigger 10 Free Spins
  • 4 Bonus scatter symbols trigger 15 Free Spins
  • 5 Bonus scatter symbols trigger 20 Free Spins
  • All wins will be relative to the current total bet and the base game paytable.
  • System malfunction voids all pays and plays.

       Buttons

  • Pressing the rotating arrow icon, above the PLAY button, will open the Autoplay functionality.
  • Pressing the ‘settings’ button, on the right-hand side of the base game screen, will open the Paytable information. The player can press the left and right arrow buttons to access the in-game information. Pressing the ‘X’ button will return the player to the main game interface.
  • Accessing the Paytable will allow the player to toggle the sounds on/off, via the settings button, located on the left-hand side of the Paytable. On a device that is compatible, the player can also turn on/off the vibrate functionality. On launch of the game, the default setting will be ON for both of these options.
  • + and - buttons on ‘Total Stake’ adjust the player's Total Stake on each spin.

 Paytable

  • Only the highest win per bet line is paid.
  • Line wins will pay from left to right only.
  • Adjustment of the stake will dynamically alter the awards in the paytable.

 Game Recovery

  • In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc.), depending on the previous state of the game, it will either resume from the point of the last spin or display the outcome of the game already in play.
  • Any winnings will be correctly credited to the player account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.
  • All results are predetermined.

 General Information

  • This game has a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 93.89%
  • For any payout which gives out fractional payments, these will be truncated to 2 decimal places.
  • The maximum payout in one spin in this game is capped at £250,000.
  • System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.
  • Due to high production values of this game, lower-tier hardware may run into compatibility issues and, in certain instances, you will not be able to play.
  • © 2018 CORE Gaming Limited. All rights reserved.
  • Unauthorised copying of any images or content by any means is not permitted.

text.gameInfo:
Wolf on Win Street is a 20 Line 5X3 reel slot themed upon the stock market based in the 1980s. The game features ‘Wolfie’s Wild Stocks’ in the base game, modifiers and a unique bonus Free Spins round which allows the player to ‘Keep’ or Sell’ any offered expanding Wild reels.

  • Set your stake: On the left of the screen, the player can choose their stake by pressing the + and - buttons. The stake will be shown in the Total Stake meter.
  • Each press of PLAY will action each reel to spin to a random position. Wins are paid for matching 3, 4 or 5 of-a-kind symbols and also 2 of-a-kind Wild and Logo symbols on winlines.
  • Line wins pay left to right. All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning from the far left.
  • All wins shown on different winlines will be shown and paid to the player.
  • The Wild symbol can substitute for ALL other symbols EXCEPT Bonus scatter symbols. Using a Wild symbol to complete a line does not incur any extra multiplier other than the win for the symbol(s) it substitutes. Only the highest paying win on each line will be counted.
  • There is a ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol that can appear on any of the 1 to 5 reels. There will only be one ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol per reel. If a ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol lands in view, then it will activate whatever event or value that is above that individual reel. During Free Spins, the ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol will activate the expanding Wilds trading event. The ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol also acts as a normal ‘Wild’ symbol too.
  • Bonus Scatter Symbols: These symbols can appear on any reel. 3 or more Bonus scatter symbols landing on any of the reels will trigger the Wolfie’s Free Spins feature and award Free Spins as per the table below. Two scatter symbols on reels 1 to 4 will trigger an anticipation on the next reels.
  • If a player triggers the Wolfie’s Free Spins feature, they will always win a predefined amount of Free Spins and also a ‘Welcome Bonus’ prize, (multiplier of current stake), at the start of every feature:
 

5 Scatters

4 Scatters

3 Scatters

Free Spins

8

7

6

Welcome Bonus

X10 stake

X7 stake

x5 stake


Wolfie's Wild Stocks

Above the 5 reels in the base game will be 5 ‘stock market positions’, represented by a panel streaming text across the reels. On every spin, multiplier values, spaces, (represented as dots), or the words ‘BONUS’ scroll across rapidly, like a stock market ticker. The ticker comes to rest just before the reels stop, so, at the top of each reel, there will be a random award. If the ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol appears on any reel, it will act as the trigger to receive the reward, if any, at the top of that reel.

Base Game Modifiers

Awarded via a telephone call to the Wolfie character:

  • Crazy Stocks - Player presses PLAY, reels keep spinning, the 5 values above the reels will scroll along the ticker and all will be ‘big’ multiplier values. Should the ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol appear on the reels, then the corresponding value above, on that particular reel, will be multiplied by the current game stake and paid as a big win to the player. It is possible to achieve ‘Wolfie Wilds’ on every reel. This does not guarantee a win.
  • Market Mover - Player presses PLAY, a market position ‘bar graph’ will appear in front of the reels, moving from right to left. As this bar graph moves, it will be populated with ‘Wilds’. Each of the bars on the chart will have stacked Wilds which fill the reel positions at various heights. Once this settles, the bar graph positions effectively, become Wild symbols and then the reels will land and pay the player any wins. This does not guarantee a win.
  • Market Crash - Player presses PLAY and a line graph will appear in front of the reels. This will leave a trail of random Wilds on the ‘peaks’ and ‘troughs’. Once this settles, the Wilds will be in place, (on the line of the graph), and the remaining base game symbols will land. This does not guarantee a win.
  • Bonus Chance - All 5 of the panels above the reels will state ‘BONUS’, therefore, any ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol in view will trigger Wolfie’s Free Spins feature.

Bonus Free Spins Feature

During the Wolfie’s Wild Free Spins feature, the Free Spins will play out and execute any wins, as per a normal spin, without taking a credit. If a ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol lands, it expands to cover the whole reel, creating a ‘Wild’ reel. Any wins created by the expanding ‘Wild’ will be paid to the player.

  • Expanding Wilds trading offer: If a ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbol lands, it covers the whole reel. The game will then make you an offer in the trading event to either ‘KEEP’ or ’SELL’ that ‘Wild’ reel and any others that the player has already got.
  • If the player accepts the instant cash offer ‘SELL’,this will remove the expanding ‘Wild’ for the rest of the Free Spins and the cash will go into the Total Win field.
  • If the players ‘KEEPS’the expanding ‘Wild’, then the cash offer is declined and the player keeps the expanding ‘Wild’ reel in place for the rest of the Free Spins. 
  • The player maynot get any ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbols during the Free Spins which, in turn, means there will be no offers during the Free Spins.
  • It is also possible to get multiple offers via the ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbols landing again. Further ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbols can land at random with a possibility to get up to5 Wild reels and, therefore, 5 offers during the Free Spins feature.
  • If the player chooses to accept an instant cash offer, (‘SELL’),removing the expanding ‘Wild’ reel, the player will still get other offers if further ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbols land. This will repeat on each and every ‘Wolfie Wild’, however, the offer value made may be different, based upon the position of the expanding ‘Wild’ reel and how many Free Spins are left. The offers will be based upon probabilities and risk.
  • If the player has declined the instant cash offers and ‘KEEPS‘the expanding ‘Wild’ reels, the player will still get offers if further ‘Wolfie Wild’ symbols land. The offer made may be different, based upon the position of the new expanding ‘Wild’ reel, also the other expanding ‘Wild’ reels in view and how many Free Spins are left.
  • Please note: If the player has declined the offer and ‘KEEPS‘the expanding ‘Wild’ reels but, on the next offer, chooses to accept the new offer ‘SELL‘, this will remove ALL the current expanding ‘Wild’ reels in view for the next Free Spins.
  • Bonus scatter symbols are not available during Free Spins.
  • All wins will be relative to the current total bet and the base game paytable.
  • System malfunction voids all pays and plays.

Buttons

  • Pressing the rotating arrow icon, above the PLAY button, will open the Autoplay functionality. This functionality is not made available if Autoplay is not allowed in that particular jurisdiction.
  • Pressing the ‘settings’ button, on the right-hand side of the base game screen, will open the Paytable information. The player can press the left and right arrow buttons to access the in-game information. Pressing the ‘X’ button will return the player to the main game interface.
  • Accessing the Paytable will allow the player to toggle the sounds on/off, via the settings button located on the left-hand side of the paytable. On a device that is compatible, the player can also turn on/off the vibrate function. On launch of the game, the default setting will be on for both of these options.
  • + and -buttons on ‘Total Stake’ adjust the player's Total Stake on each spin.

Paytable

  • Only the highest win per bet line is paid.
  • Line wins will pay from left to right only.
  • Adjustment of the stake will dynamically alter the awards in the paytable.

Game Recovery

  • In the event of a game in real play being interrupted, (i.e. started but not completed due to connectivity issues or accidentally closing the browser, etc.), depending on the previous state of the game, it will either resume from the point of the last spin or display the outcome of the game already in play.
  • Any winnings will be correctly credited to the player account and will be exact according to the result prior to the game being interrupted.
  • All results are predetermined.

General Information

  • This game has a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 95.58%
  • Any payout which gives out fractional payments, these will be truncated to 2 decimal places.
  • The maximum payout in one spin in this game is capped at 250,000.
  • System malfunction voids all pays and all plays.
  • Due to high production values of this game, lower-tier hardware may run into compatibility issues and, in certain instances, you will not be able to play.

  • © 2018 CORE Gaming Limited. All rights reserved.
  • Unauthorised copying of any images or content by any means is not permitted.

text.description: Hear the howls from the reels and activate the unique Prize Disk feature!
text.gameInfo:
Wolf Ridge

Bask in the glow of the Northern Lights and enjoy the howling big wins in Wolf Ridge! Rich rewards abound in the snow fields when Bonus scatter symbols appear on reels 1, 3, and 5 and trigger the Prize Disk feature, where each triggering symbol pays a bonus win or awards free spins. Bonus scatter symbols can appear on all reels in the Free Spins Bonus, offering even more chances to experience the untamed abundance of the Prize Disk feature!

How to Bet

Wolf Ridge features 30 paylines for 50 coins.

30 Lines + Feature

Displays the current number of coins being played.

Betting is fixed at 30 paylines which costs 50 coins.

Coins

Displays the current number of coins being played. Betting is fixed at 30 paylines, which costs 50 coins.

Total Bet

Displays the current total bet shown in currency.

Press the minus button (–) to decrease the total bet.

Press the plus button (+) to increase the total bet.

Spin

Press the circular arrow to submit the bet and spin the reels.

Prize Disk Feature

The Prize Disk feature is triggered when a Bonus scatter symbol appears on the reels. These symbols appear on reels 1, 3, and 5 in the base game and on all reels in the Free Spins Bonus.

Each triggering Bonus scatter symbol pays a bonus win or awards free spins as shown in the Prize Diskposition above the triggering symbol.

On each spin, the awards in the Prize Disk shift one reel to the left, introducing a different award in the Prize Disk position above the fifth reel.

If a Bonus scatter symbol appears in any position on reel 3 and awards a prize, the prize value is multiplied by 3.

If a Bonus scatter symbol appears in any position on reel 2 or reel 4 during the Free Spin Bonus, and awards a prize, the prize value is multiplied by 2.

The Prize Disk values used during the Free Spins Bonus are different from the Prize Disk values used in the base game. Prize Disk values are 2x – 70x the total bet in the base game, and 2x – 150x the total bet in the Free Spin Bonus.

The available Prize Disk values differ per total bet and are stored across play sessions.

Free Spins Bonus

The Free Spins Bonus is triggered when one or more Free Spins symbols are awarded from the Prize Disk feature. Each triggering Free Spins symbol awards 10 free spins. The reels in the Free Spins Bonusare richer than the base game reels, with more Bonus symbols added to the reels.

The Free Spins Bonus is retriggered when one or more Extra Spins symbols are awarded from the Prize Disk feature. Each triggering Extra Spins symbol awards 2 additional free spins.

The bonus can be retriggered multiple times, up to a maximum of 250 free spins per bonus.

Reels used during the Free Spins Bonus are different from the reels used in the base game.

Free spins are played at the same total bet and same number of paylines as the triggering spin.

Rules

Misuse or malfunction voids all pays and plays.

All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning with the far-left reel.

Only the highest winner is paid on each payline. Coinciding line wins on different paylines are added.

Only the highest scatter win is paid per scatter symbol. Coinciding scatter wins from different scatter symbols are added. Scatter wins are multiplied by the total bet.

Bonus scatter symbols appear on reels 1, 3, and 5 in the base game and on all reels in the Free Spins Bonus.

Prize Disk wins are independent from line wins and are added to the total amount paid.

Bonus wins are independent from line wins and are added to the total amount paid.

Wild symbol appears on reels 2, 3, and 4 only.

Wins are shown in currency.

In some jurisdictions, regardless of bet size, there is an award cap on any single transaction. See the paytable for details. A transaction includes the results of the bonus, plus the outcome which launched the bonus. If the award cap is reached in the bonus, the bonus ends immediately, even if there are remaining free spins.

Additional Information

RTP - 96.05%

In accordance with fair gaming practices required in most legal jurisdictions worldwide, each and every game outcome is completely independent, except in cases where one spin unlocks a feature for a subsequent spin or series of spins, per the game rules. The odds of getting any particular outcome are always the same.

The odds do not vary based on prior outcomes, bet size, balance size, time of day, day of week, etc. For example, if the top award is won on a given play of the game, the chances of winning the top award on the next play are exactly the same. Likewise, prior losses do not change future odds.

The expected payback reflects the theoretical return across a very large number of plays by numerous players over an extended period of time. The results for any given player over a play session can vary widely from this long-term, expected average in either direction. The fewer the number of games played, the wider the normal variance of actual payback that may be experienced.

Intellectual Property

© 2018 IGT. All rights reserved. All other trademarks used herein are owned by IGT or its affiliates, may not be used without permission, and where indicated with a ®, are registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.
